67b6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs tshad myed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka myi 'jigs pa tshad myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
67b7('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u
67b8('bum): shi ka de bzhin du myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmyigs su myed de/ nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir myi 'jigs pa tshad myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka so so
68a1('bum): yang dag par rig pa tshad myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi tshad ni dmyigs
68a2('bum): su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmyigs su myed de/ nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir/ so so yang
68a3('bum): dag par rig pa tshad myed do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka snying rje chen po tshad myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
68a4('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar snying rje chen po'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /
68a5('bum): ke'u shi ka de bzhin du snying rje chen po'i tshad kyang dmyigs su myed de/ nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir snying rje chen po tshad myed do/ /snying rje chen po tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi
68a6('bum): ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
68a7('bum): 'dres pa rnams kyi tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmyigs su myed de/ nam mkha' tshad
68a8('bum): myed pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa tshad myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid tshad myed
68b1('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'di
68b2('bum): lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmyigs su myed de nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir thams cad shes pa nyid tshad myed do/ /thams cad shes
68b3('bum): pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad myed pa ste/
68b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
68b5('bum): kyi tshad kyang dmyigs su myed de/ nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshad myed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka rnam pa thams cad
68b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmyigs su myed do/ /
68b7('bum): ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmyigs su myed de/ nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad myed do/ /rnam
68b8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni tshad myed pa ste 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
69a1('bum): phyin pa'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po drug pa/ kau'u shi ka gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
69a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
69a3('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka 'du shes mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
69a4('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du shes kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka 'du byed mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
69a5('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du byed kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
69a6('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka myig mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
69a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar myig gi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rna ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
69a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka sna mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
69b1('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka lce mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
69b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka lus mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
69b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka yid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
69b4('bum): phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
69b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka sgra mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
69b6('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sgra'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka dri mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
69b7('bum): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dri'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka ro mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
69b8('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar ro'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka reg mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
70a1('bum): 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar reg gi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka chos mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
70a2('bum): 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka myig gi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
70a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar myig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
70a4('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka sna'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang
70a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka lce'i rnam par shes pa mtha'
70a6('bum): yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka lus kyi
70a7('bum): rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi
70a8('bum): dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
70b1('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka myig gi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i
70b2('bum): phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
70b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
70b4('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub
70b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha'
70b6('bum): yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka
70b7('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang
70b8('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
71a1('bum): ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
71a2('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
71a3('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
71a4('bum): tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/
71a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub
71a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /
71a7('bum): ke'u shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di
71a8('bum): ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka sa'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha'
71b1('bum): yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sa'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka chu'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
71b2('bum): pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chu'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka mye'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
71b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar mye'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
71b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rlung gi khams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir/
71b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rnam par
71b6('bum): shes pa'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams
71b7('bum): kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka ma rig pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar ma
71b8('bum): rig pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka 'du byed mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du byed kyi
72a1('bum): mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de
72a2('bum): ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka mying dang gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i
72a3('bum): zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar mying dang gzugs kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka skye mched drug mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha'
72a4('bum): yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar skye mched drug gi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
72a5('bum): phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
72a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka sred pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
72a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sred pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka len pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
72a8('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar len pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka srid pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
72b1('bum): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar srid pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka skye ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
72b2('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar skye ba'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rga shi mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
72b3('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rga shi'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
72b4('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha'
72b5('bum): yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /
72b6('bum): ke'u shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha
72b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de
72b8('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
73a1('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
73a2('bum): pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus
73a3('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi mtha'
73a4('bum): dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka phyi stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyi stong
73a5('bum): pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka
73a6('bum): de ni 'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi
73a7('bum): ka de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka chen po stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u
73a8('bum): shi ka de ni 'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka don dam pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste de ci'i
73b1('bum): phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
73b2('bum): mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
73b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
73b4('bum): nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha'
73b5('bum): dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
73b6('bum): ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
73b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang
73b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka chos
74a1('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad
74a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/
74a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
74a4('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid mtha'
74a5('bum): yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi
74a6('bum): dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
74a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
74a8('bum): mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub
74b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka yang
74b2('bum): dag par spong ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus
74b3('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul
74b4('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka dbang po mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe
74b5('bum): na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dbang po rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka stobs mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
74b6('bum): mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
74b7('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
74b8('bum): pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtha' dang
75a1('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka
75a2('bum): de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka bsam gtan mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
75a3('bum): mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka tshad myed pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
75a4('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshad myed pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
75a5('bum): 'jug pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
75a6('bum): pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rnam par thar pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
75a7('bum): ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
75a8('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo
75b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di
75b2('bum): ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka mngon par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
75b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so ke'u shi ka ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
75b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka gzungs kyi sgo mtha' yas pa'i phyir/
75b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i
75b6('bum): stobs mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
75b7('bum): rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka myi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u
75b8('bum): shi ka de ni 'di ltar myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
76a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka byams pa chen po mtha' yas
76a2('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar byams pa chen po'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka snying rje
76a3('bum): chen po mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar snying rje chen po'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs
76a4('bum): so/ /ke'u shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
76a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha'
76a6('bum): yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
76a7('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
76a8('bum): mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtha' dang
76b1('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzugs mtha' yas pa dang / tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / 'du shes mtha' yas pa dang /
76b2('bum): 'du byed mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / myig mtha' yas pa dang / rna ba mtha' yas pa dang / sna mtha' yas pa dang / lce mtha' yas pa dang / lus mtha' yas pa dang / yid mtha'
76b3('bum): yas pa dang / gzugs mtha' yas pa dang / sgra mtha' yas pa dang / dri mtha' yas pa dang / ro mtha' yas pa dang / reg mtha' yas pa dang / chos mtha' yas pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa mtha'
76b4('bum): yas pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / yid kyi
76b5('bum): rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa
76b6('bum): mtha' yas pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
76b7('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
76b8('bum): ba mtha' yas pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / sa'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / chu'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / mye'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / rlung gi
77a1('bum): khams mtha' yas pa dang / nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / ma rig pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'du byed mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par shes pa mtha'
77a2('bum): yas pa dang / mying dang gzugs mtha' yas pa dang / skye mched drug mtha' yas pa dang / reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / sred pa mtha' yas pa dang / len pa mtha' yas pa dang / srid
77a3('bum): pa mtha' yas pa dang / skye ba mtha' yas pa dang / rga shi mtha' yas pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
77a4('bum): tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / nang
77a5('bum): stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / don dam pa
77a6('bum): stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa
77a7('bum): nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtha'
77a8('bum): yas pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dran
77b1('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams mtha' yas pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / dbang po rnams mtha' yas pa dang / stobs rnams mtha' yas
77b2('bum): pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtha' yas pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / bsam gtan rnams mtha'
77b3('bum): yas pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad mtha' yas pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
77b4('bum): pa dgu mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa mtha' yas pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams mtha' yas
77b5('bum): pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtha' yas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtha' yas pa dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi mtha' yas pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mtha' yas pa dang /
77b6('bum): byams pa chen po mtha' yas pa dang / snying rje chen po mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mtha' yas pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong
77b7('bum): ba'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / rang byang chub mtha' yas pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /
77b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /ke'u shi ka gzhan yang dmyigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
78a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na dmyigs pa mtha' yas
78a2('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka rnam pa thams
78a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dmyigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /ke'u shi ka gzhan yang
78a4('bum): chos dmyigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun
78a5('bum): pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na chos dmyigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes
78a6('bum): bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
78a7('bum): tu phyin pa'o/ /ke'u shi ka gzhan yang de bzhin nyid dang dmyigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab
78a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na/ dmyigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/
78b1('bum): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir dmyigs pa mtha' yas so/ /dmyigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid
78b2('bum): mtha' yas so/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin nyid dang dmyigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/ /ke'u shi ka gzhan yang sems can mtha'
78b3('bum): yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na/ sems can mtha' yas pa'i
78b4('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin zhes bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ 'di lta ste sems can sems can zhes
78b5('bum): bya ba de chos gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni chos kyi tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa'i tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin te 'di ltar sems can sems
78b6('bum): can zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa/ dngos po myed pa mying du btags pa/ dmyigs pa myed par mying du btags pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ shes rab kyi
78b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las sems can du bshad pa gang yang yod dam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni myed do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka gang la sems can du bshad pa gang
78b8('bum): yang myed pa de la/ sems can mtha' yas pa ci zhig yod de/ ke'u shi ka gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs te/
79a1('bum): sems can sems can zhes gsung du brjod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ de la sems can gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag par gyur pa yod dam/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni myed do/ /de
79a2('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thog ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de ltar rnam grangs des na/ sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
79a3('bum): mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / skyes pa dang bud myed du bcas pa dag
79a4('bum): gis lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de gang gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bshad cing
79a5('bum): brjod de/ bstan pa'i chos 'di ni kye ma legs par bshad do/ /kye ma chos 'di legs par bshad do/ /kye ma chos kyi chos nyid ni legs par bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub sems
79a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bgyi'o/ /chos gang yang dmyigs su ma mchis ste/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes
79a7('bum): sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ myig gam/ rna ba 'am/ sna 'am/ lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ gzugs sam/ sgra 'am/ dri 'am/ ro 'am/ reg gam/ chos sam/
79a8('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ myig gi
79b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
79b2('bum): tshor ba 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
79b3('bum): tshor ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ mye'i khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams
79b4('bum): sam/ ma rig pa 'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ mying dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa 'am/ tshor ba 'am/ sred pa 'am/ len pa 'am/ srid pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ rga shi 'am/
79b5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha
79b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nang stong nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/
79b7('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/
79b8('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
80a1('bum): sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
80a2('bum): 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i
80a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/
80a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
80a5('bum): sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub 'am/ thams cad shes pa nyid dam/ lam gyi rnam
80a6('bum): pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/ chos gang yang dmyigs su ma mchis kyis kyang theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa ma mchis te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nyan thos kyi theg pa dang
80a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu dbang po dang bcas pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de bzhin no/ /ji skad
80a8('bum): smras pa de bzhin no/ /chos gang yang dmyigs su myed de/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ myig gam/ rna ba 'am/ sna 'am/ lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/
80b1('bum): gzugs sam/ sgra 'am/ dri 'am/ ro 'am/ reg gam/ chos sam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lus kyi
80b2('bum): rnam par shes pa 'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/
80b3('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
80b4('bum): tshor ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ mye'i khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/ ma
80b5('bum): rig pa 'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ mying dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa 'am/ tshor ba 'am/ sred pa 'am/ len pa 'am/ srid pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ rga shi 'am/
80b6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab
80b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa
80b8('bum): nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa
81a1('bum): nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/
81a2('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam
81a3('bum): yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/
81a4('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin
81a5('bum): rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/
81a6('bum): snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra
81a7('bum): bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub 'am/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/ chos gang yang myi dmyigs mod kyi/ theg pa gsum rnam par bkod pa yang
81a8('bum): yod de/ gsum gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o/ /lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha
81b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan te/ gsum gang zhe na/
81b2('bum): 'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bshad do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi
81b3('bum): dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /brtson
81b4('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi
81b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin
81b6('bum): gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /chen po
81b7('bum): stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de
81b8('bum): bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs
82a1('bum): pa myi dmyigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /rang
82a2('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du
82a3('bum): yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi
82a4('bum): dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar
82a5('bum): gzhag pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gzhan
82a6('bum): du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /dbang po rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /stobs rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /
82a7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /'phags
82a8('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa rnams las gzhan du
82b1('bum): yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi
82b2('bum): dmyigs so/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa las gzhan
82b3('bum): du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo
82b4('bum): rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin
82b5('bum): gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /byams pa chen po las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /snying rje chen po las
82b6('bum): gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad shes pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi
82b7('bum): dmyigs so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// //
82b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bdun pa/ lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos 'di dag thams cad la slob ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo/ /
83a1('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
83a2('bum): phyin pa la slob bo/ /nang stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /phyi stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /chen po stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /
83a3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /rang
83a4('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
83a5('bum): la slob bo/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la slob bo/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams la slob bo/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la slob bo/ /dbang po rnams la slob bo/ /
83a6('bum): stobs rnams la slob bo/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la slob bo/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob bo/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la slob bo/ /bsam gtan rnams la slob bo/ /tshad
83a7('bum): myed pa rnams la slob bo/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob bo/ /rnam par thar pa rnams la slob bo/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob bo/ /rnam par thar
83a8('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la slob bo/ /mngon par shes pa rnams la slob bo/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams la slob bo/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
83b1('bum): stobs rnams la slob bo/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams la slob bo/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la slob bo/ /byams pa chen po la slob bo/ /snying rje chen po la slob bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la slob bo/ /
83b2('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la slob bo/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob bo/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob bo/ /dgra bcom pa nyid la slob bo/ /rang byang chub la slob bo/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
83b3('bum): la slob bo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob bo/ /lha'i bu dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang myi 'bral bar spyod pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs
83b4('bum): pa nyid ces bya ste/ lha'i bu dag gang gi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi zha 'breng byed cing / rgyal po'i khab pad+mo yod pa'i nang gi tshong dus kyi dbus
83b5('bum): na 'dug pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /brtson 'grus
83b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /
83b7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /chen po stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang
83b8('bum): bral bar ma gyur to/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /thog ma dang tha ma
84a1('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /rang gi mtshan
84a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
84a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /dbang po rnams
84a4('bum): dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /stobs rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
84a5('bum): dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /bsam gtan rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /tshad myed pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyom par 'jug pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /rnam par thar pa rnams dang
84a6('bum): bral bar ma gyur to/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /mngon par shes
84a7('bum): pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams
84a8('bum): dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /byams pa chen po dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /snying rje chen po dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang
84b1('bum): yang bral bar ma gyur te/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag dang yang bral bar ma gyur to/ /lha'i bu dag de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
84b2('bum): sangs rgyas mar mye mdzad kyis nga la bram ze'i khye'u khyed ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs myed pa na/ bskal pa bzang po'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba'i/ de bzhin
84b3('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang rkang par ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na myed pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang myi rnams
84b4('bum): kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lung bstan to/ /de nas lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
84b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de ltar gzugs myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshor ba myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /
84b6('bum): 'du shes myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'du byed myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / myig myi len myi
84b7('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /
84b8('bum): lus myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / gzugs myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sgra myi len myi 'dor ba'i
85a1('bum): tshul dang / dri myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ro myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / reg myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chos myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa myi len myi
85a2('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam
85a3('bum): par shes pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myi len myi
85a4('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg
85a5('bum): pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
85a6('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid
85a7('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sa'i khams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chu'i khams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mye'i khams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul
85a8('bum): dang / rlung gi khams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ma rig pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'du
85b1('bum): byed myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mying dang gzugs myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / skye mched drug myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / reg pa myi len myi
85b2('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshor ba myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sred pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / len pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / srid pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / skye ba myi len myi 'dor
85b3('bum): ba'i tshul dang / rga shi myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
85b4('bum): phyin pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi
85b5('bum): len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi len
85b6('bum): myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong
85b7('bum): pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
85b8('bum): myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i
86a1('bum): tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dngos po myed
86a2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
86a3('bum): rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dbang po rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / stobs rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i
86a4('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / bsam gtan rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshad myed pa rnams myi len
86a5('bum): myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
86a6('bum): par 'jug pa rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa rnams myi len myi
86a7('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i
86a8('bum): tshul dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / byams pa chen po myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / snying rje
86b1('bum): chen po myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / thams cad shes pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
86b2('bum): myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
86b3('bum): 'thun bar yongs su 'dzin pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor bzhi dang / byang chub sems dpa'
86b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu dang / mtshe ma'i lha'i bu dang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu dang / gzhan
86b5('bum): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs chen gyi lha'i bu dang / snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung snang
86b6('bum): gi lha'i bu dang / tshad myed snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha'i bu dang / dge ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung dge'i lha'i bu dang / tshad myed dge ba'i lha'i bu dang / dge rgyas kyi lha'i bu dang / che
86b7('bum): ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung che'i lha'i bu dang / tshad myed che ba'i lha'i bu dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu dang / myi che ba'i lha'i bu dang / myi gdung ba'i lha'i bu dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i bu dang / gya
86b8('bum): nom snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / 'og myin gyi lha'i bu de dag 'dus shing tshogs par mkhyen nas/ de dag thams cad dpang du btsugs te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka byang chub
87a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i
87a2('bum): bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / sgom pa dang / gzhan yang rgya cher 'chad pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
87a3('bum): byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang / yang myi 'bral ba de dag ni/ bdud sdig can dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis glags rnyed par myi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir
87a4('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ gzugs stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/
87a5('bum): 'du shes stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'du byed stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur
87a6('bum): ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags myi rnyed / mtshan ma myed pas mtshan ma myed pa la glags myi rnyed/ smon pa myed pas/ smon pa myed pa
87a7('bum): la glags myi rnyed do/ /de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ myig stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs
87a8('bum): par 'gyur/ sna stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs
87b1('bum): par 'gyur/ yid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags myi rnyed / mtshan ma myed pas/ mtshan ma myed
87b2('bum): pa la glags myi rnyed/ smon pa myed pas/ smon pa myed pa la glags myi rnyed do/ /de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ gzugs stong pa nyid shin tu byin
87b3('bum): gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sgra stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dri stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ ro stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par
87b4('bum): 'gyur/ reg stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chos stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la
87b5('bum): glags myi rnyed / mtshan ma myed pas/ mtshan ma myed pa la glags myi rnyed/ smon pa myed pas/ smon pa myed pa la glags myi rnyed do/ /de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs
87b6('bum): kyi bu mo de dag gis/ myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna'i rnam par shes pa
87b7('bum): stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs
87b8('bum): par 'gyur/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags myi rnyed/ mtshan ma myed pas mtshan ma
88a1('bum): myed pa la glags myi rnyed/ smon pa myed pas smon pa myed pa la glags myi rnyed do/ /de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin
88a2('bum): kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa
88a3('bum): stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /
88a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags myi rnyed/ mtshan ma myed pas mtshan ma myed pa la glags myi rnyed/ smon pa myed pas smon pa myed pa la glags myi rnyed do/ /de ni 'di ltar
88a5('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu
88a6('bum): byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis
88a7('bum): brlabs par 'gyur/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs
88a8('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags myi rnyed/ mtshan ma myed pas mtshan ma myed pa la glags myi rnyed/ smon pa myed pas smon pa myed pa la glags myi rnyed
88b1('bum): do/ /de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ sa'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mye'i khams
88b2('bum): stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par shes
88b3('bum): pa'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags myi rnyed/ mtshan ma myed pas mtshan ma myed pa la glags myi rnyed/
88b4('bum): smon pa myed pas smon pa myed pa la/ glags myi rnyed do/ /de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ ma rig pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'du byed stong pa nyid
88b5('bum): shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ skye mched drug stong pa nyid shin tu
88b6('bum): byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sred pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/
88b7('bum): len pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ srid pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ skye ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rga shi stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis
88b8('bum): brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags myi rnyed/ mtshan ma myed pas mtshan ma myed pa la glags myi rnyed/ smon pa myed pas smon pa myed pa la glags myi rnyed do/ /de ni 'di ltar rigs
89a1('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/
89a2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu

89a4('bum): stong pa nyid la glags myi rnyed/ mtshan ma myed pas mtshan ma myed pa la glags myi rnyed/ smon pa myed pas smon pa myed pa la glags myi rnyed do/ /de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/
89a5('bum): nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/
89a6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin
89a7('bum): kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mtha' las
89a8('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa
89b1('bum): nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rang gi
89b2('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin
