124a4('bum): dge'i lha'i bu dang / tshad myed dge' ba'i lha'i bu dang / dge rgyas kyi lha'i bu dang / che ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung che'i lha'i bu dang / tshad myed che ba'i lha'i bu dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu dang / myi che ba'i lha'i bu dang /
124a5('bum): myi gdung ba'i lha'i bu dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i bu dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / 'og myin gyi lha'i bu gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
124a6('bum): zab mo 'di bris shing bcangs pa de dag la rtag tu rgyun myi chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskyang ba byed de/ lha'i bu de dag 'ongs nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rim gro dang / bkur sti
124a7('bum): dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas shing 'dong bar 'gyur te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te bcangs na/ de la yang tshe 'di'i yon tan dang legs pa de dag yod par 'gyur
124a8('bum): ro/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ dper na/ snying po byang chub pa 'am/ snying po byang chub kyi 'khor tam/ snying po byang chub kyi nang na byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags sam myir gyur pa gang su 'dug
124b1('bum): kyang rung ste/ de dag la myi 'am/ myi ma yin pas gtse ba 'am/ 'tho 'tshams par myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
124b2('bum): kyang de la bzhugs nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /gang ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
124b3('bum): rgyas de dag kyang de nyid du bzhugs shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin
124b4('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag kyang de nyid la bzhugs te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
124b5('bum): so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems
124b6('bum): can thams cad 'jigs pa myed pa dang / khon myed pa dang gcugs myed par nan tan mdzad nas/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa lha dang myi'i phun sum tshogs pa la bkod par gyur to/ /bkod do
124b7('bum): dgod par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur to/ /bkod do dgod par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur to/ /bkod do dgod par 'gyur
124b8('bum): ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur to/ /bkod do dgod par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod par gyur to/ /bkod do dgod par 'gyur ro/ /rang byang chub la bkod par
125a1('bum): gyur to/ /bkod do dgod par gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod par gyur to/ /bkod do dgod par 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha
125a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis sa'i phyogs de sems can thams cad kyi mchod rten du byas pas/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
125a3('bum): mang pos phyag bya ba dang / 'dud pa dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya bar gyur to// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu pa/
125a4('bum): brgya byin gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du bgyis te/ bcangs la de la me tog dang / phreng ba
125a5('bum): dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyis pa dang / gang la las yang de
125a6('bum): b zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod rten tu bstsal
125a7('bum): te/ mchod dam/ rin po che sna bdun gyi snod du bstsal te/ de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang
125a8('bum): pos rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyis na/ de gnyis las gang gi bsod nams kyi phung po mang du 'phel ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas na de
125b1('bum): khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lung ston cig /ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
125b2('bum): brnyes pa dang / sku 'di lta bu mngon par grub pa de lam gang la bslabs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes te/ sku 'di lta bu
125b3('bum): mngon par grub par gyur/ brgya byin kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rnam pa
125b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes te/ sku 'di lta bu yang mngon par grub bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs
125b5('bum): nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes so/ /sku 'di 'dra ba yang mngon par grub bo/ /ke'u shi ka nga'i sku 'di brnyes pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su yang myi 'gro ste/ rnam pa thams cad
125b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pas de de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste/ ke'u shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ngo / /ke'u shi ka de ltar lus
125b7('bum): 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi gzhi ste/ gzhi de la rten nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes so/ /
125b8('bum): de lta bas na sku 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes de'i gzhir gyur pa ste/ sems can thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur cing phyag bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / rim gror bya
126a1('bum): bya ba dang / bkur stir bya bar gyur te/ ke'u shi ka nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas sku gdung mchod pa yang sku la mchod pa nyid du 'gyur gyi/ chos la shin tu mchod par myi 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
126a2('bum): kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / glog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang /
126a3('bum): phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror dang / bskur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas pas ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la mchod pa byas par
126a4('bum): 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bris te/ gzung bar bya'o/ /bcang bar bya'o/ /klag par bya'o/ /
126a5('bum): kun chub par bya'o/ /tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/ /me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror bya'o/ /bkur bstir
126a6('bum): bya'o/ /phu dud du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /ke'u shi ka gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten du bcug gam/ rin po che sna bdun gyi snod du
126a7('bum): blugs shing gces par byas te/ de la me tog dang 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang /
126a8('bum): mchod pa byas pa bas/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ gzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa dang / me tog dang / phreng ba
126b1('bum): dang / dri dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas na 'di nyid de bas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /
126b2('bum): ke'u shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang 'di las byung ngo / /nang stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo / /phyi stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo / /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo / /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo / /chen po stong pa
126b3('bum): nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo / /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo / /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo / /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo / /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang 'di las
126b4('bum): byung ngo / /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo / /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo / /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo / /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung
126b5('bum): ngo / /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo / /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo / /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo / /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo / /dngos po
126b6('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo / /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yang 'di las byung ngo / /yang dag par spong ba bzhi yang 'di las byung ngo / /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yang 'di las byung ngo / /
126b7('bum): dbang po lnga yang 'di las byung ngo / /stobs lnga yang 'di las byung ngo / /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yang 'di las byung ngo / /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang 'di las byung ngo / /'phags pa'i
126b8('bum): bden pa bzhi yang 'di las byung ngo / /bsam gtan bzhi yang 'di las byung ngo / /tshad myed pa bzhi yang 'di las byung ngo / /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yang 'di las byung ngo / /rnam
127a1('bum): par thar pa brgyad kyang 'di las byung ngo / /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang 'di las byung ngo / /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang
127a2('bum): 'di las byung ngo / /mngon par shes pa lnga yang 'di las byung ngo / /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo / /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang 'di
127a3('bum): las byung ngo / /myi 'jigs pa bzhi yang 'di las byung ngo / /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang 'di las byung ngo / /byams pa chen po yang 'di las byung ngo / /snying rje chen po yang 'di las byung ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi
127a4('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang 'di las byung ngo / /sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba yang 'di las byung ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yang 'di las byung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems
127a5('bum): dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa yang 'di las byung ngo / /gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yang 'di las byung ngo / /longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa yang 'di las byung ngo / /'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang
127a6('bum): 'di las byung ngo / /byams pa chen po yang 'di las byung ngo / /snying rje chen po yang 'di las byung ngo / /rgyal rigs che zhing mthong ba yang 'di las byung ngo / /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba yang 'di las byung ngo / /
127a7('bum): khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba yang 'di las byung ngo / /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /mtshe ma'i lha'i bu rnams
127a8('bum): kyang 'di las byung ngo / /dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /'phrul dga'i lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /tshangs ris
127b1('bum): kyi lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /snang ba'i lha rnams kyang
127b2('bum): 'di las byung ngo / /chung snang gi lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /dge ba'i lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /
127b3('bum): chung dge'i lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /che ba'i lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /chung che'i lha rnams
127b4('bum): kyang 'di las byung ngo / /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /myi che ba'i lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyang 'di las
127b5('bum): byung ngo / /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /'og myin gyi lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /
127b6('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /dgra bcom pa rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /byang chub sems
127b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
127b8('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo / /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
128a1('bum): pa 'di la rim gror myi bgyid / bkur stir myi bgyid/ phu dud du myi bgyid/ mchod par myi bgyid pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa de ltar mthu che bar 'tshal tam/
128a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ 'dzam bu gling gi myi de dag las gang sangs rgyas la mos pa myi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang / gang chos la mos pa myi phyed pa dang ldan
128a3('bum): pa dang / gang dge 'dun la mos pa myi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang / gang sangs rgyas la nem nur myed pa dang / gang chos la nem nur myed pa dang gang dge 'dun la nem nur myed pa dang / gang sangs rgyas la shin tu
128a4('bum): rton pa dang / gang chos la shin tu rton pa dang / gang dge 'dun la shin tu rton pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi gang sangs rgyas la mos pa myi
128a5('bum): phyed pa dang ldan pa dang / gang chos la mos pa myi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang gang dge 'dun la mos pa myi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang / gang sangs rgyas la nem nur ma mchis pa dang / gang chos la nem nur ma mchis pa dang /
128a6('bum): gang dge 'dun la nem nur ma mchis pa dang / gang sangs rgyas la shin tu rton pa dang / gang chos la shin tu rton pa dang / gang dge 'dun la shin tu rton pa de lta bu ni nyung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
128a7('bum): pa / ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi las rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum
128a8('bum): thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi las rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi las mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
128b1('bum): 'jug pa dgu thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi las so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi las mngon par shes pa drug thob pa
128b2('bum): de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod / 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi las kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/ rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi las 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /
128b3('bum): gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi las dam pa ma yin pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ phyir myi 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu
128b4('bum): ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi las bla ma'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ dgra bcom par gyur pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi las rang byang chub tu yang dag par
128b5('bum): zhugs pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi las bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ rgya byin gyis gsol pa/ 'dzam
128b6('bum): bu'i gling gi myi las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun thob pa de lta bu ni nyung ngo / /de bas kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
128b7('bum): 'jug pa dgu thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas
128b8('bum): kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi las kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i slad du/ rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams bsrabs
129a1('bum): pa'i slad du/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang dam pa ma lags pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i slad du/ phyir myi 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung
129a2('bum): ngo / /de bas kyang bla ma'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i slad du/ dgra bcom par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi las rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /
129a3('bum): de bas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi las bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/
129a4('bum): 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi de dag gi myi de dag las sangs rgyas la mos pa myi phyed pa dang / ldan pa dang / chos la mos pa myi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang / dge 'dun la mos pa phyed pa dang / ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas la nem nur myed pa
129a5('bum): dang / chos la nem nur myed pa dang / dge 'dun la nem nur myed pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang sangs rgyas la shin tu rton pa dang / chos la shin tu rton pa dang / dge 'dun la shin tu rton pa de lta bu ni ches
129a6('bum): nyung ngo / /de bas kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches
129a7('bum): nyung ngo / /de bas kyang phyir myi 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang dgra bcom par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang
129a8('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang byang chub tu spyod par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sngon 'khor ba na
129b1('bum): 'khor ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas ma mthong ba dang / chos ma thos pa dang / dge 'dun bsnyen ma bkur ba dang / sbyin pa ma byin pa dang / tshul khrims ma bsrungs pa dang / bzod pa ma bsgoms pa dang / brtson 'grus ma brtsoms pa
129b2('bum): dang / bsam gtan ma bsgoms pa dang / shes rab ma bsgoms pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
129b3('bum): tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma
129b4('bum): bsgoms pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / chen
129b5('bum): po stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / mtha'
129b6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms
129b7('bum): pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
129b8('bum): ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa
130a1('bum): dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / dbang po rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / stobs rnams ma thos ma bsgoms
130a2('bum): pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / bsam gtan rnams ma
130a3('bum): thos ma bsgoms pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / mthar
130a4('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
130a5('bum): ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / myi 'jigs pa
130a6('bum): rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / byams pa chen po ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / snying rje chen po ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
130a7('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thos ma
130a8('bum): bsgoms pa'i phyir ro/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can la las sangs rgyas la mos pa myi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang / chos la mos pa myi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang / dge
130b1('bum): 'dun la mos pa myi phyed pa dang ldan pa de lta bu ni nyung ste/ de bas kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang mthar kyis
130b2('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang mngon par shes pa drug thob pa ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang 'dzam bu'i
130b3('bum): gling gi myi rnams las kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/ rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa
130b4('bum): ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang dam pa ma yin pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ phyir myi 'ong bar gyur pa ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang bla ma'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ dgra bcom par gyur
130b5('bum): pa ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi las rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa ches nyung ngo / /de bas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhus par gyur pa ches
130b6('bum): nyung ngo / /de bas kyang bsam pa dag pa byang chub tu spyod pa ni ches nyung bar rig par bya'o/ /ke'u shi ka myi rnams lta zhog gi/ de ji snyam du sems/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams las byang chub kyi phyogs
130b7('bum): kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun thob pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
130b8('bum): bzhi thob pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams las kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/ rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'dod chags
131a1('bum): dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang / dam pa ma yin pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ phyir myi 'ong bar gyur pa dang / bla ma'i cha'i kun tu spyod pa
131a2('bum): lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ dgra bcom par gyur pa nyid dang / rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams las bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
131a3('bum): nem nur myed pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la nem nur myed pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams la mar shes pa dang / phar shes pa dang / dge sbyong du shes
131a4('bum): pa dang / bram zer shes pa dang / rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la
131a5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dang shes rab sgom pa dang / gso' sbyin la gnas pa dang / 'dod pa la kha na ma tho bar 'du shes shing / rnam par spyod pa dang / de bzhin du myi rtag par 'du shes pa dang / bdag myed par 'du
131a6('bum): shes pa dang / myi gtsang bar 'du shes pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du mngon par dga' ba myed par 'du shes pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi srogs chags las bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
131a7('bum): byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ brgya byin kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun thob pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa
131a8('bum): dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i slad du/
131b1('bum): rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrabs pa'i slad du/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang / dam pa ma lags pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i slad du/ phyir myi 'ong bar
131b2('bum): gyur pa dang / bla ma'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i slad du/ dgra bcom par gyur pa dang / rang byang chub tu zhugs pa de lta bu ni shin tu nyung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags las bla na
131b3('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni de bas kyang ches nyung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin
131b4('bum): te/ ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun thob pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa dang / mthar kyis gnas
131b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/ rgyun tu zhugs pa thob pa dang / 'dod
131b6('bum): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrab pa'i phyir/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang / dam pa ma yin pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor pa lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ phyir myi 'ong bar gyur pa dang / bla ma'i cha'i kun tu sbyor
131b7('bum): ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ dgra bcom par gyur pa dang / rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni nyung ste/ de bas
131b8('bum): kyang gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /
132a1('bum): ke'u shi ka ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa bla na myed pa yang dag par
132a2('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de la phal cher nyan thos dang
132a3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus myed pa/ bsam pa zhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba/
132a4('bum): shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/ /ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can
132a5('bum): tshad myed grangs myed pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas/ de bas gcig gam gnyis shig /phyir myi
132a6('bum): ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
132a7('bum): chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus myed pa bsam pa zhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/ /ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/
132a8('bum): nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs
132b1('bum): mkhas pa dang / myi ldan pas de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo / /
132b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus myed pa bsam pa zhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/ /
132b3('bum): ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
132b4('bum): byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas/ de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang / rang
132b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus myed pa/ bsam pa zhan pa/ mos pa dma'
132b6('bum): ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/ /ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/ byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung
132b7('bum): gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas/ de las gcig
132b8('bum): gam gnyis shig / phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba
133a1('bum): mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus myed pa/ bsam pa zhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis
133a2('bum): bsgrub par dka'o/ /ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi/ spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa/
133a3('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas/ de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal
133a4('bum): cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus myed pa bsam pa zhan pa/ mos
133a5('bum): pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/ /ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
133a6('bum): snyed dag na/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas/ de las gcig gam
133a7('bum): gnyis shig phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na myed pa yang
133a8('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus myed pa/ bsam pa zhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/ /
133b1('bum): ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa/ bla na myed pa
133b2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas/ de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi de las
133b3('bum): phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus myed pa/ bsam
133b4('bum): pa zhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/ /ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten kyi khams
133b5('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i/ thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas/
133b6('bum): de las gcig gam gnyis shig /phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi
133b7('bum): ka bla na myed pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus myed pa/ bsam pa zhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/ /ke'u shi
133b8('bum): ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag
134a1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas/ de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/
134a2('bum): de las phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus myed pa/
134a3('bum): bsam pa zhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/ /ke'u shi ka de bas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
134a4('bum): tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag myur zhing / bde bar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod na/ yang dang yang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
134a5('bum): 'di la mnyan par bya'o/ /gzung bar bya'o/ /bcang bar bya'o/ /klag par bya'o/ /kun chub par bya'o/ /tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/ /de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bzung zhing / bcang ba dang /
134a6('bum): klog cing kun chub pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas zhing bris te/ me tog dang / gdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
134a7('bum): ba dan mang pos rim gror bya'o/ /bkur stir bya'o/ /phu dud du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /dge ba'i chos gang ji snyed pa gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du 'dus te/ de dag kyang gzung bar
134a8('bum): bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ tshul bzhin du yid la bya ste/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
134b1('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa
134b2('bum): nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang /
134b3('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
134b4('bum): dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
134b5('bum): bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam
134b6('bum): par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams
134b7('bum): cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo
134b8('bum): brgyad dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gang ji snyed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du 'dus pa de dag kyang gzung bar bya'o/ /bcang bar bya'o/ /klags par bya'o/ /kun chub par
135a1('bum): bya'o/ /tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'di ltar shes par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub
135a2('bum): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul
135a3('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong
135a4('bum): pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong
135a5('bum): pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
135a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam
135a7('bum): yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
135a8('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs
135b1('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po 'di dag dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas
135b2('bum): kyi chos tshad myed pa dag la bslab par mdzad kyi/ bdag cag gis kyang de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag cag gi ston pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyis chos gzhan
135b3('bum): tshad myed pa'i bar du yang bdag cag gi ston pa ste/ de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan pa'o/ /rang sangs rgyas dang / dgra bcom pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyun
135b4('bum): tu zhugs pa rnams kyis bstan pa yang 'di yin te/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la slob slob pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob
135b5('bum): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
135b6('bum): slob slob pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la
135b7('bum): slob slob pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob slob
135b8('bum): pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob
136a1('bum): slob pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob
136a2('bum): pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la slob slob pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la slob
136a3('bum): slob pa dang / dbang po rnams la slob slob pa dang / stobs rnams la slob slob pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la slob slob pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob slob pa dang / 'phags pa'i
136a4('bum): bden pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la slob slob pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams
136a5('bum): la slob slob pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la slob slob pa dang / mngon par
136a6('bum): shes pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la slob slob pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob slob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la slob slob pa dang / myi 'jig pa rnams
136a7('bum): la slob slob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / byams pa chen po la slob slob pa dang / snying rje chen po la slob slob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la
136a8('bum): slob slob pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
136b1('bum): rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang pha rol tu phyin par gyur to/ /pha rol tu
136b2('bum): phyin to/ /pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes par 'gyur ro/ /ke 'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa
136b3('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
136b4('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brten par
136b5('bum): bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke 'u shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang
136b6('bum): lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke 'u shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang
136b7('bum): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brten par bya te/
136b8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke 'u shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin
137a1('bum): gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke 'u shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang
137a2('bum): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brten
137a3('bum): par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke 'u shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang /
137a4('bum): lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis nang stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka nang stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
137a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis phyi stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka phyi
137a6('bum): stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis phyi
137a7('bum): nang stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ thams cad kyi rten
137a8('bum): yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang
137b1('bum): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis chen po stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir
137b2('bum): zhe na/ ke'u shi ka chen po stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin
137b3('bum): no/ /de dag gis don dam pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka don dam pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
137b4('bum): thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'di
137b5('bum): ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis 'dus ma byas
137b6('bum): stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/
137b7('bum): lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos
137b8('bum): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
138a1('bum): stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
138a2('bum): thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'di ni
138a3('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/
138a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye
138a5('bum): dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
138a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir
138a7('bum): zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i
138a8('bum): bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
138b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka
138b2('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis
138b3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha
138b4('bum): dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos
138b5('bum): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la
138b6('bum): brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang
138b7('bum): myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka yang dag par spong ba 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang /
138b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i
139a1('bum): phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i
139a2('bum): bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gi dbang po rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dbang po 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin
139a3('bum): te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis stobs rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka stobs 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
139a4('bum): dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag 'di dag
139a5('bum): ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
139a6('bum): la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang
139a7('bum): myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang
139a8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis bsam gtan rnams brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bsam
139b1('bum): gtan 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis tshad myed pa rnams la brten
139b2('bum): par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka tshad myed pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin
139b3('bum): no/ /de dag gis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
139b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis rnam par thar pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rnam par thar
139b5('bum): pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis mthar kyis gnas
139b6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
139b7('bum): dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la brten par bya ste/
139b8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad
140a1('bum): kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis mngon par shes pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka mngon par shes pa 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang /
140a2('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams la brten par bya ste/
140a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar
140a4('bum): gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka gzungs kyi sgo 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad
140a5('bum): kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la brten par bya te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 'di
140a6('bum): dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis myi 'jig pa rnams la
140a7('bum): brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka myi 'jig pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye
140a8('bum): dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la brten par bya te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
140b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis snying rje chen po la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka snying rje chen po 'di ni nyan thos
140b2('bum): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
140b3('bum): la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi
140b4('bum): dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis thams cad shes pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
140b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka
140b6('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis
140b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad
140b8('bum): kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyis bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
141a1('bum): la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa byas te/ de la nam
141a2('bum): 'tsho'i bar du mye tog dang / lha rdzas kyi mye tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi
141a3('bum): gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ke'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
141a4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka
141a5('bum): de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ /gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gzhan la yang
141a6('bum): rgya cher ston cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang myi 'bral la/ gong du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil
141a7('bum): snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod nams de ches mang du 'phel lo/ /ke'u shi ka mchod rten gcig lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka gal te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
141a8('bum): kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag tshad
141b1('bum): phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam mtsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi mye tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na
141b2('bum): bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyis sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas nas/ ke'u shi ka de la ji
141b3('bum): snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
141b4('bum): stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed
141b5('bum): cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang myi 'bral la/ gong du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs
141b6('bum): kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog
141b7('bum): gi/ ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i phyir gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun las
141b8('bum): byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi mye tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha
142a1('bum): rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur
142a2('bum): bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ke'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang
142a3('bum): ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te 'dzin pa dang /
142a4('bum): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
142a5('bum): dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bskur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /ke'u shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs
142a6('bum): pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gis/ ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/
142a7('bum): stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi mye tog dang /
142a8('bum): lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan
142b1('bum): mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur sti byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ke'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa
142b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas
142b3('bum): shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
142b4('bum): dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bur de bzhin
142b5('bum): gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las
142b6('bum): 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po stong gnyis pa 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas
142b7('bum): yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang /
142b8('bum): lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/
143a1('bum): phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ke'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar
143a2('bum): gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /
143a3('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / mye tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur bstir byed / phu dud du byed/ mchod
143a4('bum): par byed na/ bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /ke'u shi ka 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po stong gnyis pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
143a5('bum): gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad
143a6('bum): phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam mtsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi
143a7('bum): gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ke'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i
143a8('bum): bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
143b1('bum): phyin pa 'di 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed kun chub par byed / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / mye tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil
143b2('bum): snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur bstir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs
143b3('bum): su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag las sems can re res/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir rin po
143b4('bum): che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag byas te/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha
143b5('bum): rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par
143b6('bum): byas pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing bzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
143b7('bum): pa nyid kyi sems dang yang ma bral bar byas te/ de la mye tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/
143b8('bum): phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de nyid bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol
144a1('bum): tu phyin pa la rim gror bgyis pa dang / bkur stir bgyis pa dang / phu dud du bgyis pa dang / mchod par bgyis pas ni/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
144a2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gror bgyis pa dang / bskur stir bgyis pa dang / phu dud du bgyis pa dang / mchod par bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
144a3('bum): snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag
144a4('bum): tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye
144a5('bum): ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par
144a6('bum): bgyis pa dang / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod
144a7('bum): pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi
144a8('bum): phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs
144b1('bum): kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis mchod par bgyis pa dang / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res
144b2('bum): kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la
144b3('bum): bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /
144b4('bum): lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur bstir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / byang phyogs kyi
144b5('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du
144b6('bum): rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi
144b7('bum): phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs
144b8('bum): kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis phu dud du bgyis mchod par bgyis pa dang / byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa
145a1('bum): de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar
145a2('bum): dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas
145a3('bum): kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang /
145a4('bum): shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las/ sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod
145a5('bum): pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas
145a6('bum): kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna
145a7('bum): tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa
145a8('bum): de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad
145b1('bum): phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza'
145b2('bum): dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur bstir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / nub byang
145b3('bum): gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i
145b4('bum): slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi
145b5('bum): phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs
145b6('bum): kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems
145b7('bum): can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag
145b8('bum): la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /
