146a1('bum): lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig
146a2('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun
146a3('bum): las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang /
146a4('bum): lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs
146a5('bum): kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar dgongs/ de'i slad du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams
146a6('bum): mang du 'phel ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka mang ngo / /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis
146a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
146a8('bum): na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis na/ bsod nams ches
146b1('bum): mang du 'phel lo/ /de'i slad du zhe na bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus te/ 'di ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / bsam gtan bzhi
146b2('bum): dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
146b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa
146b4('bum): nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang
146b5('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i
146b6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /
146b7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa gsum dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa sdug bsngal ba dang / kun
146b8('bum): 'byung ba dang / 'gogs pa dang / lam bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzin
147a1('bum): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen
147a2('bum): po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus so/ /de ni sangs rgyas
147a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa ste/ de la bslabs shing 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
147a4('bum): thams cad kyis chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur te/ phyin to/ /phyin par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bcu dgu pa'o// //
147a5('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi
147a6('bum): bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /gang gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bris shing / glegs bam du byas te/ 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / glog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin
147a7('bum): du yid la byed cing / gong du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim
147a8('bum): gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams ni tshad myed grangs myed/ bsam gyis myi khyab/ mtshungs pa/
147b1('bum): myed dpag tu myed par 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams
147b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /

147b8('bum): las byung ba ni/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /

149a5('bum): dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dper yang nye bar myi 'gro/ rgyur yang nye bar myi bzod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji srid du/ 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa de srid du/
149a6('bum): sangs rgyas dkon mchog nub par myi 'gyur ro/ /chos dkon mchog nub par myi 'gyur ro/ /dge 'dun dkon mchog nub par myi 'gyur ro/ /de srid du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung

150b1('bum): bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams

150b8('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
151a1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
151a2('bum): 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba yod do/ /bla na myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yod do/ /chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba yod do/ /sems can yongs su smin pa yod do/ /
151a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yod do/ /de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams
151a4('bum): dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams
151a5('bum): dang / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams dang / snang ba'i lha rnams dang / chung snang gi lha rnams dang / tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang dge ba'i lha rnams dang / chung dge'i lha rnams dang /
151a6('bum): tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / che ba'i lha rnams dang / chung che'i lha rnams dang / tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / myi che ba'i lha rnams dang / myi
151a7('bum): gdung ba'i lha rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams dang / 'og myin gyi lha gang ji snyed yod pa de dag la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po dag
151a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung bar bya'o/ /grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcang bar bya'o/ /grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa klag par bya'o/ /'grogs po dag shes rab kyi
151b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa kun chub par bya'o/ /grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/ /grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / klag pa dang / kun
151b2('bum): chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid byas pas ni/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par myi 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi tshul rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro/ /dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro/ /grogs
151b3('bum): po dag sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun ma chad la/ grogs po dag chos kyi tshul rgyun ma chad de/ grogs po dag dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun ma chad na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
151b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
151b5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa
151b6('bum): nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
151b7('bum): 'gyur ro/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
151b8('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
152a1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
152a2('bum): 'gyur ro/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
152a3('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
152a4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig
152a5('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan rnams
152a6('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshad myed pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa rnams
152a7('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon
152a8('bum): pa myed pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig
152b1('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa
152b2('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig
152b3('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
152b4('bum): bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rang byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
152b5('bum): ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka khyod kyis shes
152b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung shig / chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /ke'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig /
152b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka nam lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems shing / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang thab mo bya'o/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang tshams sngal
152b8('bum): lo snyam na/ de'i tshe ke'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yid kyis soms la kha ton gyis shig /tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig dang / des lha ma yin gyi bsam
153a1('bum): pa de dag phyir nub par 'gyur ro/ /sems bskyed pa de dag zlob shing / rnam par phel bar myi 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo gang dag shi 'pho ba'i tshe/ nam bdag cag ngan song du skye bar mthong
153a2('bum): na yang / ke'u shi ka khyod kyis de dag gi mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du gyis shig dang / de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / shes rab kyi pha
153a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la mos pas/ lha'i gnas de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa na de ltar don dang ldan pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
153a4('bum): bu mo gang yang su yang rung ste/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ mthar kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
153a5('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
153a6('bum): bcas pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /ma byon pa'i dus
153a7('bum): k yi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs
153a8('bum): shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin
153b1('bum): g shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
153b2('bum): pa 'di nyid la bslabs te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
153b3('bum): phyin pa 'di'i nang du nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang rung ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'dus so/ /
153b4('bum): brgya byin kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na
153b5('bum): myed pa'i rig sngags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi
153b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni myi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba'o/ /dge ba'i chos thams cad sgrub pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ke'u shi ka 'di
153b7('bum): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen po'o/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na myed pa'i rig sngags so/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab
153b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
154a1('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /ma
154a2('bum): byon pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
154a3('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs
154a4('bum): shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
154a5('bum): rig sngags 'di yod na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ tshad myed pa bzhi 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzugs myed
154a6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
154a7('bum): pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten
154a8('bum): na yod pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod
154b1('bum): pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten
154b2('bum): na yod pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod
154b3('bum): pa yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang gi mtshan
154b4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod
154b5('bum): pa yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten na yod pa
154b6('bum): yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dbang po rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ stobs rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten na
154b7('bum): yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mthar kyis
154b8('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mngon par shes
155a1('bum): pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
155a2('bum): 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ byams pa chen po 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ snying
155a3('bum): rje chen po 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' 'jig rten na
155a4('bum): yod pa yin/ de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos nyid 'jig rten na
155a5('bum): yod pa yin/ chos kyi gnas nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos skyon myed pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ myig lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten
155a6('bum): na yod pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang byang chub
155a7('bum): 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
155a8('bum): 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu gnyis pa/ ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' yod na/ dge ba bcu'i
155b1('bum): las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ tshad myed pa bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ gzugs myed
155b2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa
155b3('bum): yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig
155b4('bum): rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid
155b5('bum): 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags
155b6('bum): su yod pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa
155b7('bum): yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags
155b8('bum): su yod pa yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod
156a1('bum): pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig
156a2('bum): rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dran pa nye bar
156a3('bum): gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa
156a4('bum): yin/ dbang po rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ stobs rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/
156a5('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags
156a6('bum): su yod pa yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa
156a7('bum): 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo
156a8('bum): rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod
156b1('bum): pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ snying rje chen po 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na
156b2('bum): gdags su yod pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
156b3('bum): 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyir myi 'ong ba 'jig rten na
156b4('bum): gdags su yod pa yin/ dgra bcom pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
156b5('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin no/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yod na/ rtsi dang rgyu skar dang / skar ma thams cad gdags su yod do/ /ke'u shi ka de
156b6('bum): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yod na/ dge ba'i spyod pa dang / yang dag pa'i spyod pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i
156b7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
156b8('bum): rnam par thar pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
157a1('bum): chos ma 'dres pa'i rtsi thams cad gdags su yod do/ /slob pa dang / myi slob pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rgyu skar dang / skar ma thams cad kyang gdags su yod do/ /de bzhin
157a2('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten na yod par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe na yang byang chub sems
157a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can rnams la 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ston to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
157a4('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul
157a5('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /
157a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong
157a7('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma
157a8('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la
157b1('bum): spyod pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran
157b2('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang /
157b3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad myed pa
157b4('bum): rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang / rnam
157b5('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
157b6('bum): la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / myi 'jig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / byams pa chen po la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs
157b7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa dang / nyan thos kyi sar mi ltung ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon du myi byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smyin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
157b8('bum): zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / tshe phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sems can phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa
158a1('bum): yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa de yang shes rab kyi pha
158a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa las byung bar rig par bya'o/ /ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed
158a3('bum): pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag dang / tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan 'di dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu
158a4('bum): 'am rigs bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de tshe 'di'i yon tan gang dang
158a5('bum): ldan par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog
158a6('bum): pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smyin pa ma gtogs par dug gis dus byed par myi 'gyur ro/ /mtshon gyis dus byed par myi 'gyur
158a7('bum): ro/ /myes dus byed par myi 'gyur ro/ /chus dus byed par myi 'gyur ba nas/ nad brgya rtsa gcig gi bar gyis dus byed par myi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po dang blon pos gnod par bya ba zhig byung ba las/ gal
158a8('bum): te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton byed cing / rgyal po'i pho brang du song na/ de la glags tshol ba de dag gis glags myi rnyed de/ rgyal po'i bu dang /
158b1('bum): rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag kyang gtam dri ba dang / gtam bya bar sems shing dga' bar bya bar sems par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyi gzi
158b2('bum): brjid dang / mthus de ltar sems so/ /gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton byed cing / rgyal po'i pho brang du song na/ de la rgyal po'i bu 'am/
158b3('bum): rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag kyang dga' ba'i tshig gis gtam dri ba dang / gtam bya bar sems shing / dga' bar bya bar sems dpar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di
158b4('bum): ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar bzhag / snying rje'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems nye
158b5('bum): bar gzhag pa'i phyir te/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul
158b6('bum): bzhin du yid la byed pa ni/ tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan gang dag dang ldan par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nam yang dge ba
158b7('bum): bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang bral bar myi 'gyur te/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / dran pa
158b8('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam
159a1('bum): rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar
159a2('bum): pa rnams dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
159a3('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / myi 'jig pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas
159a4('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /de sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bya ba'i smon lam gyi dbang ma gtogs par nam yang sems can dmyal bar myi skye/ byol song
159a5('bum): gi skye gnas su myi skye/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du myi skye'o/ /de nam yang yan lag nyams pa can du myi 'gyur/ nam yang dbul po'i rigs su myi skye/ smyig ma mkhan gyi rigs sam/ smye sha
159a6('bum): can gyi rigs sam/ mgar ba 'am/ phyag dar ba 'am/ shen pa 'am/ phag gsod pa'i rigs sam/ dmangs rigs su myi skye ste/ rtag tu rgyun myi chad par myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
159a7('bum): dang ldan par 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu rdzus shing skye bar 'gyur te/ nam yang byang chub
159a8('bum): sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa dang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /de 'dod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir/ sangs
159b1('bum): rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sems can rnams kyang yongs su smyin par byed/ sangs rgyas
159b2('bum): kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yon tan 'di dag phun sum tshogs par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
159b3('bum): gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ tshul bzhin du yid la bya/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byas te/ de dag nam bla na myed pa
159b4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ tshe 'di'i yon tan dang / tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /
159b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u nyi shu'o// // de nas mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba/ glags blta ba'i bsam pa can brgya tsam zhig /bcom
159b6('bum): ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su dong ba dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu brgya po glags blta ba'i bsam pa can
159b7('bum): 'di dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas/ de la bdag gis ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod pas/ mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das
159b8('bum): kyi drung du dong nas/ bar chad byed par myi 'gyur bar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las ji snyed bzung ba de dag kha ton du bya'o snyam nas/ de
160a1('bum): nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji snyed cig bzung ba de dag kha ton du brjod do/ /de nas mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun
160a2('bum): tu rgyu ba de dag rgyang ring po ring po nas/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas lam de nyid dang / sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du gyur te/
160a3('bum): de ltar mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba de dag gis rgyang ring po ring po nas/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ lam de nyid dang / sgo de nyid nas phyir dong na de ci'i rgyu
160a4('bum): zhig snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems kyi kun tu rtog pa thugs su chud nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni
160a5('bum): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsams pas/ de'i phyir mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag rgyang ring po ring po nas/ nga la g.yas phyogs
160a6('bum): su bskor ba byas te/ lam de nyid dang / sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ba yin no/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag las 'ga' tsam la yang dkar po'i sems dang
160a7('bum): ldan pa ma mthong ste/ mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag thams cad ni gnod par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa glags blta ba'i bsam pa can sha stag ste/ 'khor 'dir
160a8('bum): 'ong bar sems pa sha stag kyang / sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngas ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i
160b1('bum): nang na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ zhe sdang ba'i sems sam/ klags blta ba'i bsam bas nye bar 'gro ba ma mthong ste/ de ni gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
160b2('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang /
160b3('bum): 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba
160b4('bum): dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad myed dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba
160b5('bum): dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lha gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed
160b6('bum): cig yod pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ /sha
160b7('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs
160b8('bum): pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang /
161a1('bum): lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams
161a2('bum): cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge
161a3('bum): 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
161a4('bum): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
161a5('bum): ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
161a6('bum): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
161a7('bum): dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di

162a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang

162a7('bum): thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi

162b2('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom

162b4('bum): za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / /de ci'i
162b5('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ /de nas bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
162b6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor bzhi po 'di dag kyang mngon tu gyur/ 'dod pa la spyod pa dang / gzugs la spyod pa'i lha 'di dag kyang mngon du gyur pa las 'dir ni gdon myi za
162b7('bum): bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur gyis/ de la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
162b8('bum): ste/ bar chad bya'o snyam du bdud sdig to can gyis/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro 'dod par gyur pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang
163a1('bum): po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/ /kye ma bdud sdig to can 'di dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro bar 'dod la bdud
163a2('bum): sdig to can gyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi rnam par bkod pa 'di ni rgyal po bim bi sa ri'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas kyang de tsam myi phod/ rgyal po sde rab tu
163a3('bum): 'pham byed dang / shAkya rnams dang / lid tsa byi rnams kyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas kyang de tsam myi phod de/ bdud sdig to can 'di ni yun ring po nas bcom
163a4('bum): ldan 'das la yang glags lta zhing / glags tshol/ sems can yang dag par brtson pa rnams la yang gtse ba'i bsam pa can yin gyis/ bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
163a5('bum): yang dag par bsam par bya'o/ /dran pas brjod par bya'o snyam nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag par bsams te/ dran pas gsal bar
163a6('bum): brjod pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin kyis ji lta ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gsal bar brjod pa de lta de ltar bdud sdig can de dag lam de nyid dang / sgo de nyid nas phyir
163a7('bum): log go/ /de nas 'khor de na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / 'og myin gyi lha'i bar du ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / na bza' mang po mngon par sprul
163a8('bum): nas/ bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'khod bzhin du bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der mngon par gtor nas/ tshig 'di skad du brjod do/ /
163b1('bum): 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi 'di rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yun ring por spyod par gyur cig /'dzam bu'i gling gi myi 'di dag ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
163b2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par yang myi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe'o/ /
163b3('bum): 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi rnams ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de srid du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / phyogs bcu kun kyi 'jig rten gyi
163b4('bum): khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par myi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon
163b5('bum): mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa yang yod par 'gyur zhe'o/ /phyogs gang na rigs kyi
163b6('bum): bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ 'chang ba'i phyogs de ni snang ba dang ldan par rig par bya'o/ /phyogs de ni mgon dang bcas
163b7('bum): shing mun pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'og myin gyi bar gyi lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ke'u shi ka de de bzhin
163b8('bum): no/ /de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji srid du 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
164a1('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par myi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
164a2('bum): ro/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / phyogs bcu kun kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
164a3('bum): rgyas rnams kyang nub par myi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
164a4('bum): chen po rnams kyi spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa yang yod par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs gang na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ 'chang
164a5('bum): ba'i phyogs de ni snang ba dang ldan par ngas shes so/ /phyogs de ni mgon dang bcas shing mun pa dang bral bar ngas shes so/ /de nas lha'i bu de dag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog mang po mngon par
164a6('bum): sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der mngon par gtor te/ 'di skad kyi tshig brjod do/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
164a7('bum): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid cing / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lhas klags myi rnyed do/ /bcom
164a8('bum): ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskyang ba bgyi'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'am
164b1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de ni ston pa 'am/ ston pa dang mtshungs
164b2('bum): pa tsam du bdag cag sems so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
164b3('bum): pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dma' ba dang ldan pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi
164b4('bum): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la
164b5('bum): bgyi ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang /
164b6('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
164b7('bum): pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan
164b8('bum): 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid btsal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams
165a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa btsal bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la
165a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha
165a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de la gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin
165a4('bum): no/ /de de bzhin te/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams
165a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las byung ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang
165a6('bum): gzhan la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ de ltar shes
165a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa
165a8('bum): las/ le'u nyi shu gcig go// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
165b1('bum): pa'i mying yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar
165b2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
165b3('bum): mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/
165b4('bum): de ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/
165b5('bum): de ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod
165b6('bum): pa ma mdzad/ de ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong
165b7('bum): pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/
165b8('bum): de ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi myi yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mying
166a1('bum): yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do/ /de ltar
166a2('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar
166a3('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams kyi
166a4('bum): mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar dbang po rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar stobs rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar byang chub kyi yan
166a5('bum): lag rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying yang yongs
166a6('bum): su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar bsam gtan rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar tshad myed
166a7('bum): pa rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do/ /ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
166a8('bum): phyin pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i mying yang yongs
166b1('bum): su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar mngon par shes pa rnams
166b2('bum): kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do/ /ji ltar
166b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i mying yang
166b4('bum): yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar snying rje chen po'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar sangs rgyas
166b5('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga
166b6('bum): dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
166b7('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang /
166b8('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
167a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag gi thog mar 'gro ba'o/ /kun tu 'dren pa'o/ /dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma
167a2('bum): bsngos pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ci snyams du sems/ rnam
167a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i tshul khrims tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
167a4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i bzod pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
167a5('bum): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin
167a6('bum): nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i bsam
167a7('bum): gtan bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
167a8('bum): pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i shes rab shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji
167b1('bum): ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam
167b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus brtson
167b3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
167b4('bum): pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad
167b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su
167b6('bum): bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol
167b7('bum): tu phyin pa yin no/ /myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /gnyis
167b8('bum): su myed pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/
168a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs
168a2('bum): su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson
168a3('bum): 'grus ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha
168a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa
168a5('bum): yin no/ /gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs
168a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis
168a7('bum): pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ ji
168a8('bum): ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims/ tshul
168b1('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos
168b2('bum): pa'i bzod pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
168b3('bum): nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
168b4('bum): gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs
168b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs gnyis su myed pa'i
168b6('bum): tshul dang / tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / myig
168b7('bum): gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rna ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sna gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / lce gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / lus gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / yid gnyis
168b8('bum): su myed pa'i tshul dang / gzugs gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sgra gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / dri gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / ro gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / reg gnyis su
169a1('bum): myed pa'i tshul dang / chos gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang /
169a2('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par
169a3('bum): shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su myed pa'i
169a4('bum): tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / myig
169a5('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
169a6('bum): ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul
169a7('bum): dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sa'i khams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / mye'i khams
169a8('bum): gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang /
169b1('bum): ma rig pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / mying dang gzugs gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / skye
169b2('bum): mched drug gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / reg pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sred pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / len pa gnyis su myed pa'i
169b3('bum): tshul dang / srid pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / skye ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rga shi gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang /
169b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang /
169b5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa
169b6('bum): nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang /
169b7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las
169b8('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin
170a1('bum): stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs
170a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
170a3('bum): stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
170a4('bum): pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / dbang po rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / stobs rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang /
170a5('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / tshad
170a6('bum): myed pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / mthar
170a7('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul
170a8('bum): dang / mngon par shes pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin
170b1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen
170b2('bum): po gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / lan cig
170b3('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / dgra bcom pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rang byang chub gnyis su
170b4('bum): myed pa'i tshul dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gyis so/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul
170b5('bum): dang / ji ltar tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'du shes gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'du byed gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam
170b6('bum): par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myig gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna gnyis su ma mchis
170b7('bum): pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lus gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar
170b8('bum): gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sgra gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dri gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ro gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar
171a1('bum): reg gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chos gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myig gi rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna ba'i rnam
171a2('bum): par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lus kyi
171a3('bum): rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji
171a4('bum): ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
171a5('bum): ji ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
171a6('bum): ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis
171a7('bum): su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su ma
171a8('bum): mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sa'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chu'i khams
171b1('bum): gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mye'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rlung gi khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar nam mkha'i khams gnyis su ma
171b2('bum): mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ma rig pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'du byed gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar
171b3('bum): rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mying dang gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar skye mched drug gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar reg pa gnyis su ma
171b4('bum): mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sred pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar len pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar srid pa gnyis su ma
171b5('bum): mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar skye ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rga shi gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
171b6('bum): ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su
171b7('bum): ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar nang stong pa nyid
171b8('bum): gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
172a1('bum): gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'dus
172a2('bum): byas stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i
172a3('bum): tshul dang / ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid
172a4('bum): gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi dmyigs
172a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul
172a6('bum): dang / ji ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yang dag
172a7('bum): par spong ba rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dbang po rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
172a8('bum): ji ltar stobs rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
172b1('bum): gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bsam gtan rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar tshad myed
172b2('bum): pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad gnyis su ma mchis
172b3('bum): pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed
172b4('bum): pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mngon par shes pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar gzungs
172b5('bum): kyi sgo rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi 'jigs pa bzhi gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
172b6('bum): ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar snying rje chen po gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gnyis
172b7('bum): su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar phyir
172b8('bum): myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dgra bcom pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rang byang chub gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lam gyi
173a1('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
173a2('bum): byang chub gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis lags/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
173a3('bum): pa/ 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshor ba ni tshor bas stong
173a4('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'du
173a5('bum): shes dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'du byed dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag
173a6('bum): gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed
173a7('bum): de gnyis su byar myed do/ /myig ni myig gis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myig dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rna ba ni rna bas stong
173a8('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /sna ni snas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sna dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag
173b1('bum): gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /lce ni lces stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lce dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /lus ni lus
173b2('bum): kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lus dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /yid ni yid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yid dang
173b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis
173b4('bum): su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /sgra ni sgras stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sgra dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /dri ni dris stong ste/ de ci'i phyir
173b5('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dri dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ro ni ros stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ro dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su
173b6('bum): myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /reg ni reg gis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar reg dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /chos ni chos
173b7('bum): kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes
173b8('bum): pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myig gi rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna
174a1('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i
174a2('bum): rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pas
174a3('bum): stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe
174a4('bum): na/ de ni 'di ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yid
174a5('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myig gi 'dus te reg
174a6('bum): pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu
174a7('bum): phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su
