174a8('bum): myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /lus
174b1('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid
174b2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ myig gi
174b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus
174b4('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed
174b5('bum): de gnyis su byar myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang pha rol
174b6('bum): tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus
174b7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/
174b8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /yid kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ yid kyi
175a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /sa'i khams ni sa'i
175a2('bum): khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sa'i khams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir
175a3('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chu'i khams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /mye'i khams ni mye'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar mye'i khams dang pha rol tu phyin pa
175a4('bum): 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rlung gi khams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar
175a5('bum): myed do/ /nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i khams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i
175a6('bum): khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ma rig pa ni ma rig pas
175a7('bum): stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ma rig pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'du
175a8('bum): byed dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su
175b1('bum): byar myed do/ /mying dang gzugs ni mying dang gzugs kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na de ni 'di ltar mying dang gzugs dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gis
175b2('bum): stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar skye mched drug dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /reg pa ni reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar reg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
175b3('bum): dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /sred pa ni sred pas stong ste/ de ci'i
175b4('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sred pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /len pa ni len pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar len pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su
175b5('bum): myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /srid pa ni srid pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar srid pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /skye ba ni skye bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir
175b6('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar skye ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rga shi ni rga shis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rga shi dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de
175b7('bum): gnyis su byar myed do/ /nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid ni
175b8('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de
176a1('bum): ni 'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong
176a2('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
176a3('bum): dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis
176a4('bum): su byar myed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ni 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus
176a5('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las
176a6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang
176a7('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba myed pa
176a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de
176b1('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
176b2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan
176b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
176b4('bum): dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / pha rol tu phyin pa
176b5('bum): 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /
176b6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de
176b7('bum): gnyis su byar myed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su
176b8('bum): byar myed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed
177a1('bum): do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed
177a2('bum): do/ /dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dbang po rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir
177a3('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
177a4('bum): ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /lam ni lam gyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lam dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag
177a5('bum): gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang pha rol tu
177a6('bum): phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams dang pha rol tu phyin
177a7('bum): pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams ni tshad myed pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshad myed pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag
177a8('bum): gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs myed
177b1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar
177b2('bum): pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir
177b3('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa
177b4('bum): myed pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa
177b5('bum): 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de
177b6('bum): gnyis su byar myed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnam
177b7('bum): ni gzungs kyi rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs
177b8('bum): pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams ni myi 'jigs pa
178a1('bum): rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myi 'jigs pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag
178a2('bum): par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong
178a3('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar snying rje chen po dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i
178a4('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ste/ de
178a5('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong
178a6('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus
178a7('bum): stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i
178a8('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dgra bcom pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rang byang chub ni rang byang chub kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rang byang
178b1('bum): chub dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
178b2('bum): dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
178b3('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /dga' bo de lta bas na/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes
178b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha
178b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /bsam gtan bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /tshad myed
178b6('bum): pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /rnam par thar pa
178b7('bum): brgyad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /rnam par thar
178b8('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
179a1('bum): phyin pa nyid do/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /de bzhin
179a2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i thog
179a3('bum): mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /snying rje chen po'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab
179a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /
179a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po la sa bon btab pa/ rgyu rkyen tshogs par gyur nas/ rnam par 'phel
179a6('bum): bar 'gyur ba yang / sa chen po ni de dag gi gnas te/ sa chen po la brten cing sa bon de dag skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten cing pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag rnam par
179a7('bum): 'phel lo/ /nang stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /phyi stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /chen po stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel
179a8('bum): lo/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /thog
179b1('bum): ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong
179b2('bum): pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
179b3('bum): nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /dbang po rnams rnam par
179b4('bum): 'phel lo/ /stobs rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rnam par
179b5('bum): 'phel lo/ /bsam gtan rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /tshad myed pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par
179b6('bum): 'phel lo/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa rnam par 'phel lo/ /mngon par shes pa
179b7('bum): rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par 'phel lo/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi
179b8('bum): rnam par 'phel lo/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/ /snying rje chen po rnam par 'phel lo/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par 'phel lo/ /thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par
180a1('bum): 'phel lo/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par 'phel te/ dga' bo rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / pha rol tu phyin pa lnga rnams
180a2('bum): rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / stong pa nyid thams cad rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnam
180a3('bum): par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi rnam
180a4('bum): par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / dbang po lnga rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / stobs lnga rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad
180a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam
180a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / bsam gtan bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad
180a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / tshad myed pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa
180a8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par 'phel
180b1('bum): lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing /
180b2('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / ting nge 'dzin rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / gzungs kyi sgo rnams rnam
180b3('bum): par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / myi 'jigs pa bzhi rnam par
180b4('bum): 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / snying rje chen po rnam par 'phel lo/ /
180b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par 'phel
180b6('bum): lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
180b7('bum): pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /dga' bo de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /stong pa nyid thams cad
180b8('bum): yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /dbang po lnga yongs su sgrub
181a1('bum): pa'o/ /stobs lnga yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs
181a2('bum): su sgrub pa'o/ /bsam gtan bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su sgrub
181a3('bum): pa'o/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /mngon par shes
181a4('bum): pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi
181a5('bum): yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /snying rje chen po yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /thams cad shes pa
181a6('bum): nyid yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
181a7('bum): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan gang bdag gis/ bcom ldan 'das
181a8('bum): las thos te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yongs su chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid
181b1('bum): pa'i yon tan gang ji snyed cig mchis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i yon tan gang ji snyed cig bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las bzung ste/ bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par
181b2('bum): bgyis pa dang / spel ba de dag thams cad bka' stsal te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / spel ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid
181b3('bum): la bgyis pas ni/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshad myed pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar
181b4('bum): 'gyur ro/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung
181b5('bum): bar 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du
181b6('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung
181b7('bum): bar 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chen po stong pa nyid
181b8('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung
182a1('bum): bar 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig
182a2('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
182a3('bum): 'gyur ro/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
182a4('bum): stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'jig rten du
182a5('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan
182a6('bum): lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
182a7('bum): 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig rten du
182a8('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
182b1('bum): ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
182b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par bgyis pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten
182b3('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha
182b4('bum): rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /'phrul dga'i lha
182b5('bum): rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /tshangs rigs kyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /
182b6('bum): tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /chung snang gi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /
182b7('bum): tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /tshad myed
182b8('bum): dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams
183a1('bum): 'jig rten na mchis so/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /shin tu mthong ba'i
183a2('bum): lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba dang /
183a3('bum): bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / kun chub bar bgyis pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams 'jig rten na
183a4('bum): mchis so/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /dgra bcom pa rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
183a5('bum): po rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par bgyis pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis
183a6('bum): pas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am
183a7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa de'i yon tan ni der zad par
183a8('bum): yang ma bshad de/ ke'u shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du
183b1('bum): yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/ tshul khrims kyi phung po tshad myed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes
183b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa
183b3('bum): de dag ni ting nge 'dzin kyi phung po tshad myed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa
183b4('bum): dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni shes rab kyi phung po tshad myed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
183b5('bum): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma
183b6('bum): bral bar byed pa de dag ni/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po tshad myed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa
183b7('bum): dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po tshad myed
183b8('bum): pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed
184a1('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i don du zhugs par rig par bya'o/ /ke'u shi ka nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
184a2('bum): kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang / gang yang rigs kyis bu 'am rigs kyi
184a3('bum): bu mo de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol pa'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po las/ ke'u shi ka tshul khrims kyi
184a4('bum): phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po 'di la ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul
184a5('bum): khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung pos brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /stong gi
184a6('bum): char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /bye ba'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya phrag
184a7('bum): stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /grangs su yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /bgrang bar yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /dper yang nye bar
184a8('bum): myi 'gro'o/ /rgyur yang myi bzod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las/ sems rnam par grol yang chos gang yang yongs su shes pa myed
184b1('bum): do/ /ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / glog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de la me tog dang /
184b2('bum): phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis de la rim 'gror byed pa dang / bkur bstir byed pa dang / phu dud du byed pa dang /
184b3('bum): mchod par byed pa de dag tshe 'di nyid dang / tshe rabs phyi ma la yon tan de dag rnam pa de bzhin du 'thob par ngas bshad do/ /brgya byin kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab
184b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar bgyid pa dang /
184b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror
184b6('bum): bgyid pa dang / bkur stir bgyid pa dang / phu dud du bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa de la ni bdag gis kyang rtag tu rgyun myi chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
184b7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du byed pa'i tshe/ lha'i bu brgya stong mang po dga' ba'i yid kyis chos nyan pa'i phyir nye bar 'ongs te/
184b8('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston pa'i tshe yang / lha'i bu de dag spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par sems so/ /chos smra ba de dag smra ba snyoms par gyur na yang / lha'i
185a1('bum): bu de dag chos kyi rim gror de nyid kyis spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par sems te/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
185a2('bum): kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil
185a3('bum): snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang / bkur bstir byed pa dang / phu dud du byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa de dag gis tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di yang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka gzhan yang
185a4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'khor bzhi la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa'i tshe/ la la zhig bdag la glan ka tshol zhing glags lta bar gyur tu 'ong ngo zhes bya bar zhum pa myed par 'gyur ro/ /de
185a5('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskyang ba byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
185a6('bum): tu phyin pa 'di la 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa dang / thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa dang / dge ba dang myi dge ba dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus
185a7('bum): ma byas dang / nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas gyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang tha myi dad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di ni dge ba'i chos
185a8('bum): thams cad kyi gter yin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang / nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas
185b1('bum): pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
185b2('bum): la gnas pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / rang
185b3('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
185b4('bum): pa nyid la gnas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la glags blta ba de yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gang glags lta ba de yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / shes
185b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang glags lta bar bya ba de yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la sus
185b6('bum): kyang glags blta ba myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed
185b7('bum): pa de'i sems zhum par myi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par myi 'gyur/ 'jigs par myi 'gyur/ sngang bar myi 'gyur/ skrag par myi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
185b8('bum): de dag gis gang zhum par 'gyur ba 'am/ yongs su zhum par 'gyur ba 'am/ 'jigs par 'gyur ba 'am/ sngang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ skrag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
186a1('bum): ba'i phyir te/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
186a2('bum): byed pa dang / bris shing de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang /
186a3('bum): bkur stir byed pa dang phu dud du byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa de dag gis tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag yongs su zin par 'gyur to/ /ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab
186a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
186a5('bum): na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang / bkur bstir byed pa dang / phu dud du byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa de ni/ pha dang ma dang / gnyen
186a6('bum): bshes dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis dgos par bya ba yin/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa dang / byang chub
186a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / dgra bcom pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag gis kyang dgos shing
186a8('bum): yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pas kyang
186b1('bum): dgos shing yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin/ spobs pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur
186b2('bum): ba yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/
186b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ nang stong pa nyid sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa
186b4('bum): myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom pa myi 'phrogs
186b5('bum): par 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom
186b6('bum): pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom
186b7('bum): pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
186b8('bum): sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
187a1('bum): sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ yang dag par spong ba sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom
187a2('bum): pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ dbang po lnga sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ stobs lnga sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba
187a3('bum): yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan bzhi sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur
187a4('bum): ba yin/ tshad myed pa bzhi sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba
187a5('bum): yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur
187a6('bum): ba yin/ mngon par shes pa sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ gzungs kyi sgo sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
187a7('bum): stobs bcu sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ snying rje chen po
187a8('bum): sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/
187b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ gzhan gyis phyir brgal pa ji snyed byung ba yang chos dang 'thun
187b2('bum): bar lan gdab pa'i mthu yod pa yin te/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
187b3('bum): byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa dang / bris shing de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
187b4('bum): ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang / bkur bstir byed pa dang / phu dud du byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa des tshe/ 'di'i yon tan 'di dag kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro// //
187b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu bzhi pa/ ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du
187b6('bum): byas te/ 'chang ba der stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang /
187b7('bum): mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed
187b8('bum): snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad myed dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
188a1('bum): du yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang der dong zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar sems
188a2('bum): so/ /gnas gtsang ma'i ris myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lha de dag kyang der dong zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang / gzung ba
188a3('bum): dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar sems so/ /ke'u shi ka phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu bla na myed pa yang dag par
188a4('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan
188a5('bum): dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad myed dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung
188a6('bum): che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya
188a7('bum): nom snang ba dang / 'ong myin gyi lha dang / de ma yin pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gzi brjid che bar bya ba mang po dag
188a8('bum): kyang der dong zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar sems so/ /ke'u shi ka de la rigs kyi bu 'am
188b1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis kyang sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul
188b2('bum): dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba
188b3('bum): dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad myed dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par

188b5('bum): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gzi brjid chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i
188b6('bum): phyir lhags pa de dag la chos kyi sbyin pa 'di byin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed par byas te/ de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang / gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / kun chub par bya ba
188b7('bum): dang / mchod pa byas shing phyag byas te/ gdud pa byas nas phyir 'dong ngo / /ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i rgyal chen bzhi'i
188b8('bum): ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /
189a1('bum): tshangs chen dang / chung snang dang / snang ba dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad myed dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang /
189a2('bum): 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lha'i bu dag dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams
189a3('bum): dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang / tshangs
189a4('bum): pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang / tshangs chen gyi lha dang / snang ba'i lha dang / chung snang gi lha dang / tshad myed snang ba'i lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge ba'i lha dang / chung dge'i lha dang / tshad myed dge ba'i lha
189a5('bum): dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / chung che'i lha dang / tshad myed che ba'i lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / myi che ba'i lha dang / myi gdung ba'i lha dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang / gya nom snang
189a6('bum): ba'i lha dang / 'og myin gyi lha de dag kyang bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskyang ba byed de/ ke'u shi ka de la las kyi rnam par smyin pa ma gtogs par glags lta ba rnams kyis kyang glags myi rnyed de/
189a7('bum): ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des tshe 'di'i yon tan de lta bu dag kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa
189a8('bum): de dag kyang der shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskyang bar bya ba'i don du 'dong bar sems te/ de ci'i
189b1('bum): phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ste/ sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang / sems
189b2('bum): can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don tu nye bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
189b3('bum): kyi bu mo des 'dir phyogs bcu kun kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / gdud pa bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang /
189b4('bum): bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir mtshe
189b5('bum): ma'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir 'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi
189b6('bum): lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs pa kun 'khor
189b7('bum): gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir snang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir chung snang gi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes
189b8('bum): bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir dge ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /
190a1('bum): 'dir chung dge'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir che ba'i lha
190a2('bum): rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir chung che ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi
190a3('bum): ba dang / 'dir myi che ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir myi gdung ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir gya nom snang ba'i lha
190a4('bum): rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir 'og myin gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi bar 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang
190a5('bum): du bzhag par snang ba chen po 'byung bar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos mthong na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des 'dir ni lha mthu bo che mthu chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba/ dbang che ba/ gzi brjid che ba dag
190a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang / bcangs pa dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / gdud par bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i
190a7('bum): phyir lhags so zhes bya ba nges par khong du chud par bya'o/ /ke'u shi ka gzhan yang gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gtsang sbra'i spyod pa dang ldan na/ de'i gtsang sbra'i spyod pa des lha de dag kyang nye bar
190a8('bum): 'ongs shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byas nas/ shin tu dga' ba'i
190b1('bum): yid du 'gyur ro/ /gnas de na lha mthu chung ngu ji snyed cig gnas pa de dag kyang lha mthu bo che mthu chen po de dag gi gzi brjid dang dpal dang zil myi bzod pa'i phyi'i gnas de nas gud du 'dong bar sems so/ /ji lta ji
190b2('bum): ltar lha mthu chen po mthu chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba/ dbang che ba/ gzi brjid che ba/ de dag nye bar 'ong bar sems pa de lta de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur
190b3('bum): ro/ /de'i gnas kyi 'khor kun tu yang gtsang sbra myed pa'i spyod pa myi rgyu bar bya te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ de'i 'khor kyi sa
190b4('bum): yang spos chu'i chag chag gis gdab bo/ /me tog dang / spos kyis gtor to/ /bdug spos 'thul ba'i snod bzhag go/ /dar gyi lda ldi dang / gos gyi bla re bre'o/ /sa'i phyogs rnam pa du mas brgyan par bya'o/ /ke'u
190b5('bum): shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la ngal zhing chad par 'gyur ba myed de/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni lus bde ba dang / lus yang ba dang / lus gsal ba yang nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'am
190b6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de ni sems bde ba dang / sems yang ba dang / sems gsal ba yang nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas nub mo nyal na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsam pas mos par
190b7('bum): byas na/ sdig to'i rmyi lam mthong bar myi 'gyur ro/ /des mthong na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myi chen po'i mtshan gsum bcu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba/
190b8('bum): dpe' byad bzang po brgyad cus kun tu brgyan pa/ sku gser gyi mdog tu bzhugs pa/ dge slong gi dge bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du bdar ba/ chos ston pa
191a1('bum): mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de las 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
191a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don
191a3('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang
191a4('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos
191a5('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi
191a6('bum): yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
191a7('bum): pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon
191a8('bum): par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa
191b1('bum): chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi chos bstan pa yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /

191b4('bum): 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur

191b6('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de'i don
191b7('bum): rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur
191b8('bum): ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par
192a1('bum): phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /
192a2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po de dag gi don
192a3('bum): rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /

192a5('bum): thos par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /

192a8('bum): par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa de dag gi don rnam
192b1('bum): par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i

192b3('bum): ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi
192b4('bum): shing yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
192b5('bum): par 'tshang rgya ba yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong mang po chos yang dag par 'gro ba
192b6('bum): myed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'di ltar yongs su bsgrub par bya'o/ /sems can mang po ni 'di ltar yongs su smyin par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni 'di ltar yongs su bzung bar bya'o/ /bdud
192b7('bum): 'khor dang bcas pa ni 'di ltar pham par bya'o zhes zer ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig
192b8('bum): na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya
193a1('bum): stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ chos ston to zhes pa'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro/ /lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams

194b8('bum): bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang
195a1('bum): mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
195a2('bum): mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim
195a3('bum): gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag
195a4('bum): kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang mye tog
195a5('bum): dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang /
195a6('bum): mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po
195a7('bum): che sna bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza'
195a8('bum): dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi
195b1('bum): sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong
195b2('bum): bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang mye tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs
195b3('bum): mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang
195b4('bum): mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang /
195b5('bum): spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang /
195b6('bum): mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po
195b7('bum): che sna bdun las byas pa/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na
195b8('bum): bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka de ltar
196a1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis rmyi lam bzang po 'di lta bu dag mthong bar 'gyur te/ de dag bde bar nyal zhing bde bar ldang bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus kyang mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/
196a2('bum): lus la yang ba'i nyams yod par 'gyur lci ba'i nyams myed par 'gyur de zas la ches chags pa myed par 'gyur/ gos la chags pa myed par 'gyur/ nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad la chags pa myed par 'gyur/
196a3('bum): zas kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur/ gos kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur/ nad kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad kyi 'du shes kyang chung bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dper na/ rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i dge slong
196a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin las langs pa'i sems yid la bya bas yongs su brlan pa la zas la cher chags pa myed pa yin/ zas kyi 'du shes chung ba yin/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
196a5('bum): de dag kyang zas la cher chags pa myed par 'gyur ro/ /zas kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la myi ma yin pa rnams lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo/ /shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom
196a6('bum): ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag
196a7('bum): kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo/ /lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
196a8('bum): nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo/ /nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed
196b1('bum): pa dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo/ /byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom
196b2('bum): ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i
196b3('bum): lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo/ /byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
196b4('bum): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems
196b5('bum): dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo/ /lho nub
196b6('bum): kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci
196b7('bum): dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa
196b8('bum): dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo/ /'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
197a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
197a2('bum): gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo/ /steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za
197a3('bum): dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo/ /ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo tshe 'di nyid la yon
197a4('bum): tan 'di dag yongs su bzung bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nan tan tu mnyan par bya'o/ /gzung bar bya'o/ /bcang bar bya'o/ /klag par bya'o/ /kun chub par bya'o/ /tshul bzhin
197a5('bum): du yid la bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang myi 'bral bar bya'o/ /ke'u shi ka de ste rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma bzung ma bcangs
197a6('bum): ma blags/ kun chub par ma byas/ tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas na yang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ me tog dang / phreng
197a7('bum): ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o/ /bkur bstir bya'o/ /phu dud du bya'o/ /mchod par
197a8('bum): bya'o/ /ke'u shi ka de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'gro ba mang po la phan pa dang / 'gro ba mang po la bde ba'i don tu zhugs pa yin/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes
197b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par bya ba dang tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba byed cing de bris te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos
197b2('bum): dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur bstir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
197b3('bum): nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/ phyogs bcu kun kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs
197b4('bum): pa rnams la nam 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang / bshos dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas pa dang /
197b5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag mya ngan las 'das nas kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten brtsigs
197b6('bum): te/ nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir
197b7('bum): byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas pas ni ma yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu gnyis so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
197b8('bum): kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gang ba zhig kyang rnyed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
198a1('bum): glegs bam du bris pa shig kyang la las byin na/ de las gang blang bar bya/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te 'dzam bu gling de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis
198a2('bum): byur bur bltam pa zhig kyang la las stsal/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang la las stsal na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bdag gis blang bar bgyi'o/ /de
198a3('bum): ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag la bdag rim gror ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ myi rton pa yang ma lags/ 'dun par myi bgyid pa yang ma lags
198a4('bum): te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gror bgyi bar myi 'tshal ba 'am/ bkur bstir bgyi bar myi 'tshal ba 'am/ phu dud du bgyi bar myi 'tshal ba 'am/ mchod
198a5('bum): par bgyi ba myi 'tshal ba yang ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ste/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
198a6('bum): gdung rnams kyang rim gror bgyi ba lags/ bkur bstir bgyi ba lags/ phu dud du bgyi ba lags/ mchod par bgyi ba lags/ sku gdung de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsgrubs pas/
198a7('bum): de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mchod pa mnga' ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das nam bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng
198a8('bum): ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil
198b1('bum): snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid cing / bkur bstir bgyid pa dang / phu dud du bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa'i tshe yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
198b2('bum): pa las byung ba lags pas na/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rim gror bgyi ba lags/ bkur stir bgyi ba lags/ phu dud du bgyi ba lags/ mchod par bgyi ba lags
198b3('bum): pas bsrung zhing rim gror dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyid do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ke'u shi ka shes rab
198b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzung du myed pa/ gzugs myed pa bltar myed pa/ thogs pa myed pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed pa yin na/ de la khyod ji ltar na shes
198b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung du myed pa/ gzugs myed pa/ bltar myed pa/ thogs pa myed pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed pa la gzung bar sems/ de ci'i phyir zhe
198b6('bum): na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'dzin pa dang / dor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin/ 'grib pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'phel ba'i phyir ma yin/ bskyed pa'i phyir ma yin/ bskyud
198b7('bum): pa'i phyir ma yin/ dbri ba'i phyir ma yin/ bsnan pa'i phyir ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir ma yin/ rnam par byang ba'i phyir ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/
198b8('bum): so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams
