199a1('bum): nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ slob pa dang myi slob pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings nye bar
199a2('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol
199a3('bum): tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar
199a4('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chen
199a5('bum): po stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/
199a6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid nye bar
199a7('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
199a8('bum): nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ yang dag par
199b1('bum): spong ba rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
199b2('bum): nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshad myed pa
199b3('bum): rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
199b4('bum): nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams nye bar
199b5('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig
199b6('bum): pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lan cig
199b7('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang byang chub nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes
199b8('bum): pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin no/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang
200a1('bum): gis de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos
200a2('bum): rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ slob pa dang myi slob pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/
200a3('bum): so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub
200a4('bum): pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi
200a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid nye
200a6('bum): bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub
200a7('bum): pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong
200a8('bum): pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa
200b1('bum): stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dran
200b2('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/
200b3('bum): stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
200b4('bum): nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshad myed pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam
200b5('bum): par thar pa brgyad nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa
200b6('bum): nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
200b7('bum): rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
200b8('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub
201a1('bum): pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang byang chub nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa 'di nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nye bar
201a2('bum): sgrub pa ma yin no zhes bya bar shes pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par
201a3('bum): bya ba ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni myi gnyis pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni myi gnyis pa'o/ /
201a4('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni myi gnyis pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin
201a5('bum): te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni myi gnyis pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni myi gnyis pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
201a6('bum): phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni myi gnyis pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ ke'u shi ka legs
201a7('bum): so legs so/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni myi gnyis pa'o/ /
201a8('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni myi gnyis pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes
201b1('bum): par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni myi gnyis pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod pa'i pha
201b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni myi gnyis pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni myi gnyis pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha
201b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni myi gnyis pa'o/ /ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa
201b4('bum): de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi
201b5('bum): ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
201b6('bum): tu phyin pa de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u
201b7('bum): shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi
201b8('bum): dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang tshul khrims
202a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
202a2('bum): pa de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di
202a3('bum): ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis
202a4('bum): su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
202a5('bum): phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su myed de gnyis
202a6('bum): su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
202a7('bum): tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su myed de/ gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i
202a8('bum): phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su myed de/ gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de
202b1('bum): ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi
202b2('bum): ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de
202b3('bum): la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi
202b4('bum): ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang
202b5('bum): dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /
202b6('bum): ke'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
202b7('bum): tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod
202b8('bum): du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
203a1('bum): phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i
203a2('bum): mtha' de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
203a3('bum): ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de
203a4('bum): ni/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis
203a5('bum): su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
203a6('bum): ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
203a7('bum): pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis myi
203a8('bum): khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad
203b1('bum): do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang tshul khrims
203b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
203b3('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis
203b4('bum): su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// //
203b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcwo lnga pa/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das shes
203b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi bar 'os pa ste/ de la bslabs pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/
203b7('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das
203b8('bum): gang gi tshe bdag chos bzang po'i lha'i 'khor du bdag nyid kyi lha'i dbang po'i stan la mchis par gyur pa de'i tshe/ der lha'i bu gang ji snyed cig bdag gi rim gro la mchis pa de dag kun kyang bdag la
204a1('bum): mchod par bgyid de/ nam bdag der ma mchis shing bstan de la ma mchis pa de'i tshe/ yang lha'i bu de dag 'khor der mchis shing / lha'i dbang po brgya byin stan 'di la 'dug cing / sum
204a2('bum): bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la chos ston to zhes stan de la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bgyis shing / phyag 'tshal te slar mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
204a3('bum): 'di bris shing 'chang ba dang / kha ton du bgyid cing gzhan la yang rgya cher ston pa der/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'i lding
204a4('bum): dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'di las byung ngo / /nyan thos dang / rang sangs
204a5('bum): rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo / /sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo / /zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag bgyi zhing 'dud pa bgyis nas/
204a6('bum): slar mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas sku gdung rnams mchod pa mnga' ba yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs pa'i slad du mchod pa mnga' ste/ de ci'i
204a7('bum): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi gzhir
204a8('bum): gyur to/ /rgyur gyur to/ /rkyen du gyur to/ /yongs su bsgrub par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/ cha de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/
204b1('bum): bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di blangs te/ chos kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i yid kyis kha ton bgyid pa de'i tshe/ 'jigs pa 'am/ bag tsha ba'i mtshan ma tsam yang / yang dag par rjes su myi
204b2('bum): mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos
204b3('bum): su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma
204b4('bum): mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma
204b5('bum): mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /
204b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom
204b7('bum): ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma
204b8('bum): ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis
205a1('bum): pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyi
205a2('bum): nang stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni smos
205a3('bum): su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom
205a4('bum): ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas
205a5('bum): stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni mtshan
205a6('bum): ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/
205a7('bum): rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/
205a8('bum): rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/
205b1('bum): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa
205b2('bum): ste/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan
205b3('bum): 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rang
205b4('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das myi dmyigs
205b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni
205b6('bum): smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom
205b7('bum): ldan 'das dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /
205b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan
206a1('bum): 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan
206a2('bum): 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dbang
206a3('bum): po rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags
206a4('bum): ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du
206a5('bum): ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du
206a6('bum): ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/
206a7('bum): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom
206a8('bum): ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das tshad myed pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das tshad myed pa rnams ni
206b1('bum): smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs myed
206b2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par
206b3('bum): thar pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
206b4('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags
206b5('bum): ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams ni
206b6('bum): mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/
206b7('bum): rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod
206b8('bum): du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma
207a1('bum): mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das myi 'jigs pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/
207a2('bum): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das myi 'jigs pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma
207a3('bum): mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom
207a4('bum): ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
207a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das thams
207a6('bum): cad shes pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni
207a7('bum): smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni
207a8('bum): smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa zhig lags te/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma lags na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
207b1('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ chos thams cad la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
207b2('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis pa'i chos myi
207b3('bum): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis pa de'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pas
207b4('bum): chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
207b5('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis pa'i chos ston to/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang shar
207b6('bum): phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / nub phyogs kyi de bzhin
207b7('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin
207b8('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / lho nub kyi phyogs
208a1('bum): mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
208a2('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
208a3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mang pos cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/ /mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du
208a4('bum): brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la dbab pa bstan pa gsungs te/
208a5('bum): bshad pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te/ gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang myi 'dra ba ma mchis so/ /de ci'i
208a6('bum): slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo/ /'di las byung ba
208a7('bum): ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa
208a8('bum): dang / chos rab tu byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten
208b1('bum): gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal
208b2('bum): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing / mye
208b3('bum): tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyi rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud
208b4('bum): dang / mchod pa bgyis par yang myi 'dra ba ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ /
208b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
208b6('bum): bgyid cing / gzhan la yang rgya cher ston pa des ni/ sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma
208b7('bum): mchis par bgyi'o/ /nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par
208b8('bum): rig par bgyi'o de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin to/ /'chang ngo / /klog go/ /kun chub par bgyid do/ /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa bris pa de la yang mye tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang na
209a1('bum): bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid/ bkur stir bgyid/ phu dud du bgyid/ mchod par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
209a2('bum): 'jig pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa'o/ /nad thams cad rab tu sel ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun
209a3('bum): chub par bgyid pa dang / de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyid pa des
209a4('bum): ni/ gang nas kyang 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu nor gyi bdag po zhig 'jigs nas rgyal po la gnas shing / rgyal po la rten na/ de rgyal po la gnas shing / rgyal
209a5('bum): po la rten pas/ sus 'jigs pa de dag nyid kyang de la rten pas/ de dag gis 'jigs par myi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni de ltar gsha' ste/ gang rgyal po la rten pa ni mthu dang ldan pa la rten pa'o/ /
209a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs pas na/ mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang lags
209a7('bum): pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs par blta'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bas ni/ bdag gis cha de gnyis las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid blang bar bgyi'o/ /bcom
209a8('bum): ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so/ /'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs
209b1('bum): pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o/ /'di las byung ba ni myi 'jigs pa bzhi'o/ /'di las byung ba ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'o/ /'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
209b2('bum): 'dres pa bcwo brgyad do/ /'di las byung ba ni byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ste/ de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo/ /
209b3('bum): 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das grong ngam/ grong rdal lam/ grong khyer ram/ khams sam/ rgyal po'i gnas sam/ stong gsum gyi
209b4('bum): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de bris shing rim gro dang / bkur sti dang /
209b5('bum): phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyis pa de dag tu myi 'am myi ma lags pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba rnams kyis/ glags rnyed par myi 'gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum las/
209b6('bum): theg pa gang yang rung bas/ mthar kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po dang ldan pa
209b7('bum): ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de ltar sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi don du nye bar gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mchis
209b8('bum): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der ni/ sangs rgyas byung ba dang 'dra bar blta'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po myi dpogs rin chen ces bgyi ba mchis te/ de ni nor bu rin po che chen po'i
210a1('bum): yon tan gyis rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ nor bu rin po che de gang dang gang du bzhag pa der myi ma lags pa rnams kyis glags myi rnyed do/ /myi ma lags pas zin pa'i skyes pa 'am bud myed kyang
210a2('bum): nor bu rin po che de bstan na/ myi ma lags pa de nor bu rin po che chen po de'i gzig brjid myi bzod de/ myur du 'pho zhing myi gnas so/ /mkhris pas gdungs pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/
210a3('bum): mkhris pa de yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung gis mnar pa'i lus la/ nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ rlung de yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bad kan gyis non pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ bad kan
210a4('bum): de yang zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'dus pa'i bros btab pa'i lus la/ nor bu rin po che de btags na/ 'dus pa'i bro de yang zhi bar 'gyur zhing rnam par myi 'phel lo/ /nub mo ni snang bar bgyid pa'o/ /tsha ba'i dus na ni
210a5('bum): nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du zhugs pa'i sa phyogs de bsil bar gyur to/ /grangs ba'i dus na rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du bzhags pa'i sa phyogs de dro bar bgyid do/ /nor bu rin po che chen po de dag sa'i
210a6('bum): phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i sa phyogs de yang ha cang yang myi dro/ /ha cang yang myi grang zhing / ran pa phun sum tshogs par bgyid do/ /nor bu rin po che chen po de dag sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i sa'i phyogs der/
210a7('bum): sbrul lam sdig pa la stsogs pa gdug pa gzhan dag kyang rgyu bar myi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das skyes pa 'am/ bud myed la la zhig sbrul gdug pas zin pa la/ nor bu rin po che chen po de bstan na/
210a8('bum): des de mthong ma thag tu dug de yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni/ yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ skyes pa 'am/ bud myed la la zhig 'brum bus btab
210b1('bum): bam/ myig rab rib can du gyur te/ myig gis nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam/ lkog ma'i nad dam/ lus kyi nad cig byung ba las de'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po btags na/ de dag gi 'brum bu
210b2('bum): 'am/ rab rib bam/ myig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam/ lkog ma'i nad dam/ lus kyi nad de dag zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa
210b3('bum): 'di lta bu dag dang yang ldan te/ gang te nor bu rin po che chen po de/ chab rnyogs pa can gyi nang du stsal na/ de'i mod la chab de thams cad kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan zhing kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro/ /gal te
210b4('bum): nor bu rin po che chen po de gos sngon pos dkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ /gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos ser pos bkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de
210b5('bum): yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ /gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos dmar pos bkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ /gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de/ gos dkar
210b6('bum): pos dkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ /gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de/ gos leb rgan gyis dkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du
210b7('bum): 'gyur ro/ /gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de/ shel gyis kha dog gi gos kyis dkris te/ chab kyis nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ /de dag dang gos gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/
210b8('bum): nor bu rin po che chen po de dkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ /chab de la rnyog pa mchis pa yang nor bu rin po che chen po des 'dang ste/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin
211a1('bum): po che chen po de ni/ yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag dang / gzhan yang rnam pa mang po dag dang ldan no/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang lha rdzas gyis nor bu rin po che chen po de
211a2('bum): dang 'dra bar yon tan thams cad kyis 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste/ sdig pa thams cad sel ba'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du
211a3('bum): sems/ nor bu rin po che chen po de lha rdzas shig yin nam/ 'on te nor bu rin po che chen po de 'dzam bu gling gi myi rnams la yang yod/ brgya byin gyis smras so/ /btsun pa dga' bo/ /nor bu rin po che chen po
211a4('bum): de ni lha rdzas te/ btsun pa dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi rnams la/ nor bu rin po che gang yod pa de dag ni chung zhing lci/ lha rdzas kyis nor bu rin po che chen po de ni che zhing yang ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling gis
211a5('bum): myi rnams kyi nor bu rin po che de dag ni lha rdzas ltar yan lag de dag gis yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi nor bu rin po che de dag gis ni/ lha rdzas kyis nor bu rin po che'i grangs sam/ cha 'am
211a6('bum): bgrang ba 'am/ dpe 'am/ rgyur yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de snod
211a7('bum): la la zhig gi nang du stsal stsal pa las/ snod de nas phyung yang snod de ni nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan gyis yid du mchis par 'gyur te/ gzhan yang snod de la mos pa bskyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes
211a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang na mchis pa de'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis lus sam/ sems kyi sdug bsngal dang / gnod pa myi las gyur pa 'am/ myi ma lags pa las gyur pa thams
211b1('bum): cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po zhes bgyis pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bla dgas so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so/ /bcom
211b2('bum): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ci snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol
211b3('bum): tu phyin pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs
211b4('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni
211b5('bum): tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/
211b6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta
211b7('bum): ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan
211b8('bum): 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
212a1('bum): phyin pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang nang
212a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang phyi stong pa
212a3('bum): nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid
212a4('bum): kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang stong
212a5('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chen po stong pa nyid gyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
212a6('bum): de dag kyang chen po stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin
212a7('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /
212a8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad
212b1('bum): ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mtha' las
212b2('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi yon
212b3('bum): tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /
212b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / dor ba myed
212b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag
212b6('bum): kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin
212b7('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi
212b8('bum): yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig
213a1('bum): brjod par bgyi ste/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das dngos po
213a2('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
213a3('bum): kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ngo bo
213a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /
213a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dran pa
213a6('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i yon tan
213a7('bum): lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan
213a8('bum): 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
213b1('bum): rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das dbang po lnga'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dbang po rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / dbang po
213b2('bum): rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das stobs lnga'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ stobs rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / stobs
213b3('bum): rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs
213b4('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
213b5('bum): brgyad pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed
213b6('bum): cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan
213b7('bum): bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gtan rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / bsam gtan rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das tshad myed pa
213b8('bum): bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ tshad myed pa rnams kyis yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / tshad myed pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das gzugs
214a1('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de
214a2('bum): dag kyang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis
214a3('bum): so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / rnam par thar pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mthar
214a4('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das
214a5('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
214a6('bum): gdung de dag kyang / rnam par thar pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /
214a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yon tan ni tshad
214a8('bum): ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
214b1('bum): kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par
214b2('bum): bgyi ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das myi
214b3('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi snod do/ /
214b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ so so yang dag par rigs pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de
214b5('bum): dag kyang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ snying rje chen po'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
214b6('bum): gdung de dag kyang / snying rje chen po'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi
214b7('bum): yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par
214b8('bum): bgyi ste/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / thams cad shes pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes
215a1('bum): pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ci snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ lam gyis rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi
215a2('bum): snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
215a3('bum): sku gdung de dag kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin
215a4('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / de bzhin nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /
215a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid
215a6('bum): kyi/ yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das chos nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/
215a7('bum): chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / chos nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos kyi dbyings
215a8('bum): kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / chos kyi dbyings kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/
215b1('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / chos kyi gnas nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das chos myi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig
215b2('bum): brjod par bgyi ste/ chos myi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / chos myi 'gyur ba nyid gyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha'i yon tan lta ji snyed
215b3('bum): cig brjod par bgyi ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon
215b4('bum): tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das bag chags
215b5('bum): kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs
215b6('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/
215b7('bum): rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das myi nyams pa'i chos nyid kyi yon
215b8('bum): tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ myi nyams pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / myi nyams pa'i chos nyid kyi snod do/ /de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i
216a1('bum): sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o/ /
216a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod
216a3('bum): pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/ pha rol tu phyind pa myi skye ba myi 'gag pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de
216a4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyind pa blang ba ma mchis pa dang / dor ba ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
216a5('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyind pa dbri ba dang / bsnan pa ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni
216a6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag
216a7('bum): ni pha rol tu phyind pa chos nyid kyi snod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/ pha rol tu phyind pa chos nyid kyis yongs su bsgoms pa'o/ /de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las
216a8('bum): 'das kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o/ /gzhan yang stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur yongs su gtams
216b1('bum): pa lta zhog gi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyis khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bu gtams pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs
216b2('bum): bam du bris pa zhig stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
216b3('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung rnams te mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsgoms pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa
216b4('bum): mnga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la rim gror bgyid pa dang / bkur stir bgyid pa dang / phu dud du bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa yang /
216b5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mtha' myi dmyigs shing / rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi
216b6('bum): lha 'am/ mtshe ma'i lha 'am dga' ldan gyi lha 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lha 'am gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du mying dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / bde ba myong nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sdug bsngal kyi mthar 'byung ste/
216b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mchod pa'i 'bras bu ni de tsam du bas gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing bcangs pa dang / klags shing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ ting nge
216b8('bum): 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
217a1('bum): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
217a2('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
217a3('bum): 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /thog ma
217a4('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su
217a5('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
217a6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par
217a7('bum): spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub
217a8('bum): kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan
217b1('bum): bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par
217b2('bum): 'gyur ro/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /mngon
217b3('bum): par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
217b4('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
217b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de ched du bsams te lus yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /lus de dag gi sems can yongs su smyin par bgyid par 'gyur te/
217b6('bum): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i lus sam/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar skyes pa'i lus sam/ brgya byin gyi gzugs sam
217b7('bum): tshangs pa'i gzugs sam/ ngal bso po'i gzugs kyang rung ste/ lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smyin par bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/ byang chub
217b8('bum): sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes
218a1('bum): pa thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gro ma mchis pa yang ma lags/
218a2('bum): glo ba ma mchis pa yang ma mchis/ mchod par myi 'tshal pa yang ma lags/ gzungs bar myi 'tshal ba yang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
218a3('bum): bu mo rnams kyis/ rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyi na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rgyu shin tu bstsags pa lags/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur/
218a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la yang / rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyis khams tshad dang
218a5('bum): grangs ma mchis pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag chos kyi sku dang / gzugs kyis sku dang /
218a6('bum): ye shes kyis skur mthong bar 'tshal zhing / mchod par 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid gzungs bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ klag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gzhan
218a7('bum): la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyi ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kyi khams grangs dang / tshad ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs
218a8('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des/ chos nyid du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa
218b1('bum): bsgom par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong bar 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha
218b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di gzungs bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ klag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/ chos nyid tshul bzhin du yang yid la bgyi'o/ /
218b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gnyis po 'di dag ni chos nyid de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dus byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / 'dus ma byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das de la 'dus byas chos rnams
218b4('bum): kyis chos nyid gang lags she na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi
218b5('bum): ye shes dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gyi ye shes dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / thog ma
218b6('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
218b7('bum): nyid kyi ye shes dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gyi ye shes dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
218b8('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / dbang po lnga'i ye shes dang / stobs lnga'i ye shes dang / byang chub kyi yan
219a1('bum): lag bdun gyi ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / bsam gtan bzhi'i ye shes dang / tshad myed pa bzhi'i ye shes dang /
219a2('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ye shes dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ye shes dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
219a3('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa lnga'i ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyi ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
219a4('bum): bcu'i ye shes dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / snying rje chen po'i ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ye shes dang / dge ba'i
219a5('bum): chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / myi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams kyis ye shes dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyi
219a6('bum): ye shes dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes gang lags pa de ni/ 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o/ /de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/
219a7('bum): de ni gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis
219a8('bum): pa dang / 'phel ba ma mchis pa dang / 'grib pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags she na/ chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ de ni 'dus
219b1('bum): ma byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
219b2('bum): sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cing byung ba de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de
219b3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
219b4('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya'o/ /da ltar byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kyi khams tshad myed grangs myed pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
219b5('bum): gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
219b6('bum): rgyas so/ /'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
219b7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cing 'byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji
219b8('bum): snyed cig yod pa de dag gis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
220a1('bum): thob bo/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro 'das pa'i dus kyi
220a2('bum): rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cing byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed pa dag na/ rang sangs rgyas ji snyed
220a3('bum): cig 'khod cing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ rang byang chub thob bo/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
220a4('bum): las theg pa gsum po thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag kyang tshad myed pa'i tshul dang / dmyigs pa myed pa'i tshul dang / skye ba myed pa'i tshul dang / 'gag pa myed pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs myed pa'i
220a5('bum): tshul dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i tshul dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i tshul dang / len pa myed pa'i tshul dang / 'dor ba myed pa'i tshul dang / dbri ba myed pa'i tshul dang / bsnan pa myed pa'i tshul dang /
220a6('bum): blang ba myed pa'i tshul dang / spangs pa myed pa'i tshul gyis bstan te/ de yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi tshul gyis bstan gyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
220a7('bum): ni ring du song ba ma yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul rol ma yin/ pha rol ma yin/ thang du 'dug pa ma yin/ gshong du 'dug pa ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin/
220a8('bum): mi mnyam pa ma yin/ mtshan ma ma yin/ mtshan ma myed pa ma yin/ 'jig rten pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/ 'dus byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin/ dge ba ma yin/ myi dge
220b1('bum): ba ma yin/ 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/
220b2('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
220b3('bum): pa ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
220b4('bum): pa ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin no// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu drug pa/
220b5('bum): brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ste bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa
220b6('bum): rnams ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa 'di 'tshal te/ sems can du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /sems can du gdags par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /bdag tu dmyigs pa
220b7('bum): ma mchis so/ /sems can du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /srog tu dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /'gro bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /gso' bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /skyes bur dmyigs pa
220b8('bum): ma mchis so/ /gang zag du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /shed can du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /shes bdag tu dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /byed pa por dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /tshor ba por dmyigs pa ma
221a1('bum): mchis so/ /shes pa por dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /mthong ba por dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /gzugs su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /'du shes su dmyigs
221a2('bum): pa ma mchis so/ /'du byed du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /myig du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rna bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /snar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /
221a3('bum): lcer dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /lus su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /yid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /gzugs su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /sgrar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /drir dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /
221a4('bum): ror dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /reg du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /chos su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /myig gi rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma
221a5('bum): mchis so/ /sna'i rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /lce'i rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes par dmyigs
221a6('bum): pa ma mchis so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg
221a7('bum): par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmyigs
221a8('bum): pa ma mchis so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /lce'i 'dus
221b1('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /
221b2('bum): sa'i khams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /chu'i khams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /mye'i khams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rlung gi khams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha'i
221b3('bum): khams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /ma rigs par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /'du byed du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rnam par shes par
221b4('bum): dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /mying dang gzugs su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /skye mched drug du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /sred par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /len par dmyigs
221b5('bum): pa ma mchis so/ /srid par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /skye bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rga shir dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol
221b6('bum): tu phyin par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par
221b7('bum): dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /nang stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /phyi stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid du
221b8('bum): dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /chen po stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid du
222a1('bum): dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs
