222a2('bum): pa ma mchis so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rang gi
222a3('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs
222a4('bum): pa ma mchis so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /yang dag par spongs ba rnams su dmyigs pa ma
222a5('bum): mchis so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /dbang po rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /stobs rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su
222a6('bum): dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /bsam gtan rnams su dmyigs
222a7('bum): pa ma mchis so/ /tshad myed pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /
222a8('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams su
222b1('bum): dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /myi
222b2('bum): 'jigs pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /so so yang dag par rigs pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /snying rje chen por dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su dmyigs
222b3('bum): pa ma mchis so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /dgra bcom
222b4('bum): pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rang byang chub du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /lam kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /byang chub tu dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /sangs rgyas su
222b5('bum): dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos su dmyigs pa ma mchis ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmyigs pa'i tshul du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di
222b6('bum): ltar gang gis dmyigs par bgyi ba dang / gang la dmyigs par bgyi ba dang / gang du dmyigs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid de la ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka
222b7('bum): de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yun ring por spyod pas des byang chub kyang myi dmyigs na/ sangs rgyas
222b8('bum): lta ci smos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos lta 'di ci smos/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
223a1('bum): kyi/ de ma lags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan la myi spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po kun
223a2('bum): la'ang / de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod de/ des sbyin pa'ang myi dmyigs/ gtong ba 'ang myi dmyigs/ len pa 'ang myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyang myi dmyigs tshul khrims dang ldan pa'ang myi dmyigs
223a3('bum): tshul khrims ngan pa'ang myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa 'ang myi dmyigs/ bzod pa dang ldan pa 'ang myi dmyigs gnod sems kyang myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyang myi dmyigs/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pa 'ang myi dmyigs/
223a4('bum): le lo yang myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan yang myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan pa yang myi dmyigs/ 'khrug pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyang myi dmyigs/ shes rab dang ldan pa yang myi dmyigs/ shes rab
223a5('bum): 'chal pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzugs myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed myi
223a6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myig myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sna myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lce myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lus myi dmyigs
223a7('bum): pa'i tshul dang / yid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sgra myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dri myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / ro myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / reg myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /
223a8('bum): chos myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /
223b1('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /
223b2('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi
223b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las
223b4('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi
223b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sa'i khams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mye'i khams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams myi
223b6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / ma rig pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /
223b7('bum): rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mying dang gzugs myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i
223b8('bum): tshul dang / sred pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / len pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / srid pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / skye ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rga shi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha
224a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
224a2('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid
224a3('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i
224a4('bum): tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa
224a5('bum): nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rang gi
224a6('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /
224a7('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa
224a8('bum): bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dbang po lnga myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / stobs lnga myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
224b1('bum): brgyad pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / tshad myed pa bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs myed pa'i
224b2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i
224b3('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa lnga myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / gzungs
224b4('bum): kyi sgo thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi myi dmyigs
224b5('bum): pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /
224b6('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dgra bcom pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rang byang chub myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /
224b7('bum): lam kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
224b8('bum): dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
225a1('bum): chen po tshul khrims bsrungs pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
225a2('bum): chen pos/ bzod pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
225a3('bum): brtson 'grus brtsom pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan
225a4('bum): la snyoms par 'jug pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la
225a5('bum): rnam par lta ba'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi shing rnams lo ma sna tshogs can/ me tog sna tshogs
225a6('bum): can/ 'bras bu sna tshogs can/ dbyibs sna tshogs can/ chu zheng sna tshogs can du 'khod kyang / de dag gi grib ma la khyad par ram/ bye brag myi dmyigs te/ gzhan du na grib ma grib ma zhes bya ba'i grangs
225a7('bum): su 'gro bar zad do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su yongs su bsngos pa rnams la yang khyad par ram/
225a8('bum): bye brag myi dmyigs so/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i slad du yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o/ /
225b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du tshad ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yon tan mu
225b2('bum): ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du yon tan kun tu mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing / glegs bam
225b3('bum): du bgyid te/ bcangs pa dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur
225b4('bum): stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis te/ de nas gong du ji skad du bstan pa bzhin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la
225b5('bum): las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bgyis te/ gzhan du stsal na/ de gnyis las gang gis bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas
225b6('bum): na khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig /ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la/ me tog
225b7('bum): dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil bsnyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod
225b8('bum): pa byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar kyi 'bru tsam zhig gzhan la byin te/ bgo bshar byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
226a1('bum): la las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar kyi 'bru tsam po de blangs te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
226a2('bum): sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de dag las gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel ba yin/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
226a3('bum): bdag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ de la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang /
226a4('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa bas/
226a5('bum): gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar kyi 'bru tsam gzhan stsal na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams cher 'phel lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
226a6('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang / don de nyid gzigs te/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig ste/
226a7('bum): sems can gyi ris na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel kyis 'dul ba'i sems can ma mchis pa rnams kyi slad du/ thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung du byin gyis
226a8('bum): brlabs so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang la las/ chung du na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam la/ mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bgyis na/ de dag thams cad kyang
226b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma thug par sdug bsngal mthar phyin par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
226b2('bum): mo la las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas na/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil
226b3('bum): snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas pa bas/ gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ chos kyi dga' bas gzhan byin na/ rigs kyi bu 'am
226b4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du gzhan
226b5('bum): gyi drung du song ste/ bshad cing bstan pa dang / brjod cing bkrol ba dang / rnam par phye ste gsal bar byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag pas
226b6('bum): bsod nams cher 'phel te/ de ni ston pa yin par bsam mo/ /bla ma'i gnas mkhas pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la la zhig yin par bsam mo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di la shes rab
226b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin te/ ston pa ni gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzhan zhes bya ba myed kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ston pa/ ston pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
226b8('bum): phyin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la slabs pas/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
227a1('bum): kyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa mtshungs
227a2('bum): par spyod pa de dag kyang / phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las gud na myed de/ de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
227a3('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing /
227a4('bum): nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i
227a5('bum): 'bras bu thob bo 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las
227a6('bum): bslabs shing / rang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
227a7('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs so 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par
227a8('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/
227b1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
227b2('bum): dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ mngon du rim gror bya bar 'dod pa dang / bkur stir bya bar 'dod pa dang / phu dud du bya bar 'dod pa dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
227b3('bum): tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bya'o/ /bkur stir bya'o/ /
227b4('bum): phu dud du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /ke'u shi ka des don de nyid kyi dbang yang dag par mthong ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di snyam ste/
227b5('bum): gang zhig la bdag gis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par byas ste/ brten cing rnam par spyod par bya snyam na/ ke'u shi ka de la ngas 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa/
227b6('bum): tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / myi dang lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na nga dang 'dra ba 'am/ lhag pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas/ de la ngas 'di snyam du bsams
227b7('bum): te/ de ltar yin na bdag gis chos zhi ba bzang po gang bdag nyid kyis/ mngon par sangs rgyas pa de nyid la/ rim gro dang / bkur bstir dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas te/ brten cing rnam par spyod par
227b8('bum): bya'o/ /snyam du bsams so/ /ke'u shi ka chos de 'ang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yin te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar nga nyid kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la/ rim gror
228a1('bum): byed/ bkur bstir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed de/ de ltar rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas pa'i rnam par spyod na/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na myed pa yang
228a2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang /
228a3('bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lta ji smos/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs
228a4('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang /
228a5('bum): phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i
228a6('bum): phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so/ /byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
228a7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las byung ba ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so/ /ke'u shi ka de lta bas na/
228a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
228b1('bum): phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bya'o/ /bkur stir bya'o/ /
228b2('bum): phu dud du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /de ltar de la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /
228b3('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /
228b4('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis kyang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob bo 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las brgya byin le'u
228b5('bum): nyi shu gsum mo/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi
228b6('bum): sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de de'i rgyus/ de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram/
228b7('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs
228b8('bum): bam klag pa 'am/ bri ba 'am/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyir/ gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa myed pa'i chos
229a1('bum): gang la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo slob cing / yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par
229a2('bum): gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob
229a3('bum): pa dang / thob par 'gyur pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur pa dang /
229a4('bum): 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa
229a5('bum): dang 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
229a6('bum): bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mang po rgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos rgya cher bstan pa de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
229a7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid
229a8('bum): dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed
229b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong
229b2('bum): pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga
229b3('bum): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
229b4('bum): 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes
229b5('bum): pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi
229b6('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / 'di dag ni zag pa myed pa'i chos te/ de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
229b7('bum): rgya cher bstan to/ /de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
229b8('bum): rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka sems can gcig gcig rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gzhag na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches
230a1('bum): mang du 'phel gyi/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pas ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod
230a2('bum): pa'i sems can rnams ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba ma yin no/ /ke'u shi ka rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa'i
230a3('bum): sems can ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba'i phyir te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
230a4('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta ji smos/ ke'u shi ka gang la las 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang /
230a5('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa bas/ la la zhig gis sems can gcig gcig rang byang chub la gzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /
230a6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad rang byang chub tu bkod pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can cig
230a7('bum): gcig bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can gcig po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
230a8('bum): byang chub tu gzhog pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun myi gcad pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /
230b1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so/ /ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
230b2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ /ke'u shi ka rnams grangs des na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba yin te/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/
230b3('bum): bdud dang bcas pa/ tshang pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
230b4('bum): sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba yin par shes par bya'o/ /ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ 'dzam bu'i gling
230b5('bum): gi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/ ke'u shi ka de ci snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/
230b6('bum): brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis
230b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam bris pa 'am/ bklags pa 'am/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
230b8('bum): las/ zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs
231a1('bum): pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /
231a2('bum): 'thob bo 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /
231a3('bum): 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa
231a4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par tshangs brgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
231a5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
231a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas
231a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
231a8('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gis mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
231b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spongs ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
231b2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par
231b3('bum): thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
231b4('bum): gzungs kyis sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang /
231b5('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang brgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am
231b6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/ klags pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de ni bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar
231b7('bum): shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad brgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i
231b8('bum): rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /
232a1('bum): mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /
232a2('bum): tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i
232a3('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i
232a4('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu
232a5('bum): mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya noms snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnams shes mtha' yas skye mched
232a6('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul
232a7('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
232a8('bum): pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod
232b1('bum): do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
232b2('bum): yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod
232b3('bum): do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba
232b4('bum): rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyis yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
232b5('bum): pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar
232b6('bum): pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams
232b7('bum): yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs gyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /
232b8('bum): snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ongs ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /
233a1('bum): dgra bcom pa yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig
233a2('bum): phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
233a3('bum): yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka gling bzhi pa'i
233a4('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ /la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems
233a5('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
233a6('bum): stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nam
233a7('bum): ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams brgya cher bstan te/ de dge la bslabs shing / rigs
233a8('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur
233b1('bum): ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ongs ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par
233b2('bum): gyur to/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
233b3('bum): kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
233b4('bum): sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang / gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
233b5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
233b6('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
233b7('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
233b8('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
234a1('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
234a2('bum): rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
234a3('bum): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
234a4('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
234a5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje
234a6('bum): chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang brgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi
234a7('bum): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klags pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches
234a8('bum): mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/
234b1('bum): rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha
234b2('bum): rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul
234b3('bum): dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod
234b4('bum): do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /
234b5('bum): chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha
234b6('bum): rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams
234b7('bum): yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha
234b8('bum): rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha
235a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /
235a2('bum): phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma
235a3('bum): byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /
235a4('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /
235a5('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po
235a6('bum): rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /
235a7('bum): bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
235a8('bum): 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /
235b1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po rnams
235b2('bum): yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cing phyir 'ongs ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
235b3('bum): yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa
235b4('bum): rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'
235b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /ke'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi
235b6('bum): khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba
235b7('bum): bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ /de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /
235b8('bum): bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag
236a1('bum): pa dang / bri ba dang / kha don du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las
236a2('bum): zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams brgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go 'jug par 'gyur
236a3('bum): ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi
236a4('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyis theg pa ba rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob
236a5('bum): par gyur to/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go 'jug par
236a6('bum): 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
236a7('bum): ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang / gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
236a8('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
236b1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang
236b2('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
236b3('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang
236b4('bum): pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed
236b5('bum): pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
236b6('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi
236b7('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang
236b8('bum): snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang brgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/
237a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klags pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /
237a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i
237a3('bum): rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /
237a4('bum): mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /
237a5('bum): tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyis lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gis lha rnams yod do/ /
237a6('bum): tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /
237a7('bum): che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /
237a8('bum): shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnams shes mtha' yas
237b1('bum): skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /
237b2('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab
237b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /
237b4('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
237b5('bum): yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa
237b6('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /
237b7('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /
237b8('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed
238a1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
238a2('bum): dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs
238a3('bum): pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo
238a4('bum): brgyad yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub
238a5('bum): yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /
238a6('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin
238a7('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu bdun pa/
238a8('bum): ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs gyis bu 'am/
238b1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la las/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams/ de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/
238b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab
238b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bri ba dang / klag pa dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di ltar/ shes
238b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par
238b5('bum): zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir
238b6('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ongs ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /
238b7('bum): 'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
238b8('bum): chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
239a1('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa
239a2('bum): myed pa'i chos de dag kyang / gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
239a3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
239a4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
239a5('bum): nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong
239a6('bum): pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye
239a7('bum): bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi
239a8('bum): yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par
239b1('bum): mthar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par
239b2('bum): shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag
239b3('bum): par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/
239b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan te/ ke'u shi ka /rnams grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab
239b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klags pa dang / bris pa dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas de'i bsod nams ches mang du
239b6('bum): 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka /de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag
239b7('bum): yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing
239b8('bum): mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i
240a1('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan kyi lha rnams
240a2('bum): yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod
240a3('bum): do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che
240a4('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi
240a5('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin
240a6('bum): skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi
240a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong
240a8('bum): pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /
240b1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par
240b2('bum): spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /
240b3('bum): bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyom par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
240b4('bum): nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /
240b5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
240b6('bum): yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi
240b7('bum): 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
240b8('bum): rgyas rnams yod do/ /ke'u shi ka /stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
241a1('bum): kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
241a2('bum): mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam bri ba dang / klag pa dang /
241a3('bum): kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag
241a4('bum): la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob
241a5('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /
241a6('bum): 'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub
241a7('bum): sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /
241a8('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
241b1('bum): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
241b2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa
241b3('bum): nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i
241b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam
241b5('bum): yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i
241b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang de bzhin
241b7('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen
241b8('bum): po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan te/ ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
242a1('bum): phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
242a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che
242a3('bum): zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams
242a4('bum): yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams
242a5('bum): yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /
242a6('bum): tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /
242a7('bum): myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
242a8('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
242b1('bum): phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /
242b2('bum): nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas
242b3('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
242b4('bum): nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /
242b5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan
242b6('bum): rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
242b7('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams
242b8('bum): yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /
243a1('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong
243a2('bum): ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
243a3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /ke'u shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las/
243a4('bum): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka /de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar
243a5('bum): gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton
243a6('bum): bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs
243a7('bum): shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur
243a8('bum): ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo
243b1('bum): thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i
243b2('bum): skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs
243b3('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
243b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid
243b5('bum): dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams
243b6('bum): cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
243b7('bum): dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
243b8('bum): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
244a1('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang
244a2('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa
244a3('bum): gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton
244a4('bum): du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya
244a5('bum): cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
244a6('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /
244a7('bum): tshangs rigs kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod
244a8('bum): do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams
244b1('bum): yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /
244b2('bum): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha
244b3('bum): rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
244b4('bum): phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa
244b5('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin
244b6('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed
244b7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub
244b8('bum): kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
245a1('bum): pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge
245a2('bum): 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
245a3('bum): pa bco brgyad yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod
245a4('bum): do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems
245a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /ke'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
245a6('bum): kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs bu 'am/ rigs
245a7('bum): kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
245a8('bum): gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
245b1('bum): phyin pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs
