245b2('bum): pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra
245b3('bum): bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
245b4('bum): rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
245b5('bum): rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
245b6('bum): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
245b7('bum): dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong
245b8('bum): pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
246a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam
246a2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
246a3('bum): pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
246a4('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs
246a5('bum): rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang /
246a6('bum): kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/
246a7('bum): de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum
246a8('bum): cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /
246b1('bum): tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang
246b2('bum): dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed
246b3('bum): che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha
246b4('bum): rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi
246b5('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /
246b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas
246b7('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong
246b8('bum): pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag
247a1('bum): pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan
247a2('bum): lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar
247a3('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams
247a4('bum): yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
247a5('bum): 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod
247a6('bum): do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
247a7('bum): yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems
247a8('bum): can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las/ bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/
247b1('bum): ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
247b2('bum): stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du
247b3('bum): 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag
247b4('bum): yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur
247b5('bum): to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas
247b6('bum): kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par
247b7('bum): gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
247b8('bum): rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
248a1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
248a2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong
248a3('bum): pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed
248a4('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags
248a5('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
248a6('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
248a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba
248a8('bum): chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang / rgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha
248b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
248b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan to/ /de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba
248b3('bum): rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams
248b4('bum): yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /
248b5('bum): tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i
248b6('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams
248b7('bum): yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye
248b8('bum): mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /
249a1('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid
249a2('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
249a3('bum): yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /
249a4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /
249a5('bum): stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /
249a6('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
249a7('bum): smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag
249a8('bum): par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ongs ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /
249b1('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams
249b2('bum): yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
249b3('bum): yod do/ /ke'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la
249b4('bum): las/ bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am
249b5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu
249b6('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni
249b7('bum): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /
249b8('bum): 'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi
250a1('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub
250a2('bum): thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par 'gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang
250a3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i
250a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
250a5('bum): dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las
250a6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa
250a7('bum): nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang
250a8('bum): po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i
250b1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang /
250b2('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen
250b3('bum): po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/
250b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes
250b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /
250b6('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /
250b7('bum): tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams
250b8('bum): yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che ba'i
251a1('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /
251a2('bum): gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha
251a3('bum): rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus
251a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong
251a5('bum): pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa
251a6('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid
251a7('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams
251a8('bum): yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /
251b1('bum): tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
251b2('bum): nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs
251b3('bum): pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ongs ba'i 'bras
251b4('bum): bu yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /
251b5('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin
251b6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ dum bu bdun pa/ bam po bco brgyad pa/
251b7('bum): ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las/
251b8('bum): bsam gtan bzhi la bkod do/ /tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am
252a1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de
252a2('bum): bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i gleg bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir
252a3('bum): zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i
252a4('bum): skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
252a5('bum): thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /
252a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par
252a7('bum): zhugs par 'gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par
252a8('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
252b1('bum): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
252b2('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma
252b3('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed
252b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga
252b5('bum): dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs
252b6('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang /
252b7('bum): mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
252b8('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnam
253a1('bum): rnams grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/
253a2('bum): de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya cher stan to/ /de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho' ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs
253a3('bum): che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /
253a4('bum): dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshang pa kun
253a5('bum): 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /
253a6('bum): dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyis lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che
253a7('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams
253a8('bum): yod do/ /'og myin gyis lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /
253b1('bum): 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
253b2('bum): phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod
253b3('bum): do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa
253b4('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs
253b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba
253b6('bum): rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /
253b7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar
253b8('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /
254a1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jig pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi
254a2('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /
254a3('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams
254a4('bum): yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /
254a5('bum): ke'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag /rigs kyi bu 'am
254a6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la las/ bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam
254a7('bum): du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
254a8('bum): stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod
254b1('bum): nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab shing / rigs kyi bu 'am
254b2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong
254b3('bum): ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par
254b4('bum): 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i
254b5('bum): skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs
254b6('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
254b7('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
254b8('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa
255a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
255a2('bum): dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
255a3('bum): bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad
255a4('bum): dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo
255a5('bum): thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
255a6('bum): dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab
255a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka
255a8('bum): de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba
255b1('bum): rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams
255b2('bum): yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshang pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen
255b3('bum): gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge ba'i lha rnams
255b4('bum): yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /
255b5('bum): myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
255b6('bum): mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i
255b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi
255b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa
256a1('bum): nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos
256a2('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /
256a3('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags
256a4('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par mthar
256a5('bum): pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams
256a6('bum): yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos
256a7('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ongs ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnams
256a8('bum): pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs
256b1('bum): sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /ke'u shi ka shar phyogs kyi 'jig
256b2('bum): rten gyis khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
256b3('bum): 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom
256b4('bum): ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs
256b5('bum): bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa myed pa'i
256b6('bum): chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
256b7('bum): bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par
256b8('bum): 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams gyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems
257a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
257a2('bum): par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
257a3('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
257a4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang /
257a5('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
257a6('bum): dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
257a7('bum): bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa
257a8('bum): brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo
257b1('bum): thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga'
257b2('bum): ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
257b3('bum): pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha
257b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /
257b5('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha
257b6('bum): rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i
257b7('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha
257b8('bum): rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /
258a1('bum): myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes
258a2('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha
258a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa
258a4('bum): nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das
258a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /
258a6('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams
258a7('bum): yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa
258a8('bum): rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
258b1('bum): yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
258b2('bum): yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong
258b3('bum): ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba
258b4('bum): rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
258b5('bum): rnams yod do/ /ke'u shi ka lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag /rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi
258b6('bum): dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/
258b7('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
258b8('bum): 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa myed
259a1('bum): pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu
259a2('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /
259a3('bum): thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub
259a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par 'gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
259a5('bum): par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul
259a6('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang /
259a7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa
259a8('bum): stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa
259b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
259b2('bum): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed
259b3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa
259b4('bum): drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
259b5('bum): pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnam
259b6('bum): grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gleg bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du
259b7('bum): 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /
259b8('bum): bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gis rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi
260a1('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun
260a2('bum): 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i
260a3('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams
260a4('bum): yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams
260a5('bum): yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye
260a6('bum): mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan
260a7('bum): gyis pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /
260a8('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa
260b1('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
260b2('bum): yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs
260b3('bum): rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /
260b4('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa
260b5('bum): dang / smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams
260b6('bum): yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /
260b7('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir
260b8('bum): 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
261a1('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /ke'u shi ka nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ge'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la
261a2('bum): las/ bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am
261a3('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/
261a4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i gleg bam klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes
261a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag /yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /
261a6('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /
261a7('bum): thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'
261a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
261b1('bum): sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
261b2('bum): tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
261b3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang /
261b4('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa
261b5('bum): nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po
261b6('bum): lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
261b7('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang /
261b8('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang /
262a1('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnams grangs des kyang
262a2('bum): rigs bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar
262a3('bum): shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs
262a4('bum): che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /
262a5('bum): dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor
262a6('bum): gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams
262a7('bum): yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras
262a8('bum): bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha'
262b1('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /
262b2('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi
262b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stongs pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod
262b4('bum): do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa
262b5('bum): nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag
262b6('bum): pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag
262b7('bum): brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i
262b8('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs
263a1('bum): pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
263a2('bum): 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ongs ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
263a3('bum): pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
263a4('bum): chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /ke'u shi ka byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa
263a5('bum): de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam
263a6('bum): du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
263a7('bum): ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /
263a8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon
263b1('bum): myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyan tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /
263b2('bum): thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/
263b3('bum): rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur
263b4('bum): ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
263b5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
263b6('bum): phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
263b7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa
263b8('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
264a1('bum): dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
264a2('bum): 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo
264a3('bum): thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms
264a4('bum): chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang /
264a5('bum): bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan pa/ de dag yod pas
264a6('bum): rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams
264a7('bum): yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams
264a8('bum): yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /
264b1('bum): chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i
264b2('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas
264b3('bum): skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/
264b4('bum): bam po bcu dgu pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa
264b5('bum): yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid
264b6('bum): yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /
264b7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /
264b8('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i
265a1('bum): bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i
265a2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /
265a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs
265a4('bum): pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams
265a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /
265a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /ke'u shi ka byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi
265a7('bum): 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las/ bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang /
265a8('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa snga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i
265b1('bum): rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
265b2('bum): bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam glag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
265b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /
265b4('bum): 'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur
265b5('bum): ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyis
265b6('bum): theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par
265b7('bum): zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /
265b8('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka /zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
266a1('bum): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
266a2('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed
266a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong
266a4('bum): pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi
266a5('bum): yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
266a6('bum): bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par
266a7('bum): shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
266a8('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad
266b1('bum): myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gleg bam du bris shing /
266b2('bum): klag dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes
266b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /
266b4('bum): khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi
266b5('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs
266b6('bum): pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang
266b7('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /
266b8('bum): chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha
267a1('bum): rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /
267a2('bum): chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
267a3('bum): pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa
267a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong
267a5('bum): pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed
