267a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
267a7('bum): yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /
267a8('bum): bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo
267b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa
267b2('bum): rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /
267b3('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir
267b4('bum): 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
267b5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /ke'u shi ka /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la
267b6('bum): las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka ji snyam du sems
267b7('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis
267b8('bum): bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/
268a1('bum): bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing /
268a2('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par
268a3('bum): 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa
268a4('bum): nyid thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'
268a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
268a6('bum): sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
268a7('bum): phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
268a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
268b1('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
268b2('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye
268b3('bum): bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
268b4('bum): lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
268b5('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
268b6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
268b7('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs
268b8('bum): des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gleg bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams mang du 'phel bar
269a1('bum): shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba
269a2('bum): rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
269a3('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /
269a4('bum): tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i
269a5('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i
269a6('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu
269a7('bum): mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
269a8('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims
269b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /
269b2('bum): nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong
269b3('bum): pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong
269b4('bum): pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /
269b5('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /
269b6('bum): stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lags brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /
269b7('bum): tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /
269b8('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams
270a1('bum): yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas
270a2('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /
270a3('bum): rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi
270a4('bum): 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
270a5('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /ke'u shi ka lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa
270a6('bum): de dag / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa
270a7('bum): lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /
270a8('bum): bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs
270b1('bum): bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
270b2('bum): pa 'di las/ zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur
270b3('bum): to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /
270b4('bum): 'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob
270b5('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
270b6('bum): chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
270b7('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/
270b8('bum): 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
271a1('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid
271a2('bum): dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba
271a3('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
271a4('bum): dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
271a5('bum): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
271a6('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
271a7('bum): smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
271a8('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/
271b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris
271b2('bum): shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha
271b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs
271b4('bum): che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha
271b5('bum): rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha
271b6('bum): rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i
271b7('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu
271b8('bum): che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /
272a1('bum): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed
272a2('bum): myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /
272a3('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po
272a4('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /
272a5('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
272a6('bum): yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /
272a7('bum): dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan
272a8('bum): rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /
272b1('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin
272b2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /
272b3('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa
272b4('bum): shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams
272b5('bum): yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
272b6('bum): rnams yod do/ /ke'u shi ka nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam
272b7('bum): gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ci snyam du sems/ rigs kyi
272b8('bum): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
273a1('bum): pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan
273a2('bum): la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag
273a3('bum): la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
273a4('bum): thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par
273a5('bum): gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob
273a6('bum): par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /
273a7('bum): 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par
273a8('bum): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
273b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong
273b2('bum): pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
273b3('bum): dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs
273b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi
273b5('bum): dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
273b6('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang /
273b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi
273b8('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya
274a1('bum): cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang /
274a2('bum): kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/
274a3('bum): chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho
274a4('bum): ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i
274a5('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha
274a6('bum): rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha
274a7('bum): rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i
274a8('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /
274b1('bum): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye
274b2('bum): mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /
274b3('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /
274b4('bum): chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
274b5('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa
274b6('bum): nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams
274b7('bum): yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /
274b8('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /
275a1('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge
275a2('bum): 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /
275a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang
275a4('bum): byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /
275a5('bum): dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
275a6('bum): yod do/ /ke'u shi ka 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/
275a7('bum): tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
275a8('bum): nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyis bu 'am rigs
275b1('bum): kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam/ klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
275b2('bum): ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i
275b3('bum): skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob
275b4('bum): par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /
275b5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i
275b6('bum): skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par
275b7('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
275b8('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
276a1('bum): dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma
276a2('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
276a3('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
276a4('bum): bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang /
276a5('bum): tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
276a6('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
276a7('bum): dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang /
276a8('bum): btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab
276b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
276b2('bum): ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho
276b3('bum): ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga'
276b4('bum): ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs
276b5('bum): pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha
276b6('bum): rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /
276b7('bum): chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i
276b8('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha
277a1('bum): rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /
277a2('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab
277a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa
277a4('bum): nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang
277a5('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi
277a6('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /
277a7('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam
277a8('bum): yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
277b1('bum): yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do/ /
277b2('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang
277b3('bum): dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod
277b4('bum): do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams
277b5('bum): yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
277b6('bum): yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /ke'u shi ka steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can
277b7('bum): ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa
277b8('bum): lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /
278a1('bum): bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i
278a2('bum): glegs bam/ klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
278a3('bum): pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /
278a4('bum): 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /
278a5('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa
278a6('bum): rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par
278a7('bum): 'gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs
278a8('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
278b1('bum): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa
278b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
278b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong
278b4('bum): pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
278b5('bum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed
278b6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed
278b7('bum): pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
278b8('bum): rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
279a1('bum): tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnams grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs
279a2('bum): bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni
279a3('bum): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod
279a4('bum): do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi
279a5('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor
279a6('bum): gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /
279a7('bum): dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad
279a8('bum): myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i
279b1('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched
279b2('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu
279b3('bum): phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /
279b4('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /
279b5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa
279b6('bum): nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
279b7('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /
279b8('bum): byang chub kyi yan lags rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams
280a1('bum): yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i
280a2('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
280a3('bum): stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun tu
280a4('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
280a5('bum): nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /
280a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/
280a7('bum): @// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu pa/ ke'u shi ka gzhan na yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu
280a8('bum): phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi
280b1('bum): sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par
280b2('bum): shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no/ /gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang /
280b3('bum): tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no/ /stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
280b4('bum): sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon
280b5('bum): par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no/ /stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi
280b6('bum): dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
280b7('bum): khams kyi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
280b8('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no/ /de la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ni 'di yin te/ gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/
281a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis pa spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la
281a2('bum): spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod
281a3('bum): pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
281a4('bum): byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog
281a5('bum): pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub
281a6('bum): par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
281a7('bum): pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/
281a8('bum): nang stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ phyi stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis
281b1('bum): la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/
281b2('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ chen po stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis

281b4('bum): ma yin pa'i blos/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshul
281b5('bum): bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis
281b6('bum): la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la
281b7('bum): spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ rang bzhin stong pa
281b8('bum): nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /
282a1('bum): gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa
282a2('bum): la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ dngos po myed pa stong
282a3('bum): pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa
282a4('bum): yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa
282a5('bum): yang ma yin pa'i blos/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ yang dag par spong ba

282a7('bum): spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ dbang po rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i
282a8('bum): blos/ stobs rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ byang chub kyi
282b1('bum): kyi yan lag rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshul bzhin du yid la byed
282b2('bum): pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis
282b3('bum): pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ bsam gtan rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ tshad myed pa rnams
282b4('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /
282b5('bum): gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ rnam par thar pa brgyad tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod
282b6('bum): pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/
282b7('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ mngon par
282b8('bum): shes pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ ting nge 'dzin rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la
283a1('bum): spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang
283a2('bum): ma yin pa'i blos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ myi 'jigs pa
283a3('bum): rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis
283a4('bum): la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ snying rje chen po tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin
283a5('bum): ba'i blos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ thams cad shes pa nyid
283a6('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la
283a7('bum): spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu
283a8('bum): mo la la zhig / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rnam grangs du mar rgya cher rjod cing ston la/ 'chad cing 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed cing / gsal bar byed la/ yang dag par
283b1('bum): ston cing / de'i don gtan la bab par ston par byed na/ ke'u shi ka de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su lta ba ma yin/ gnyis su myed par lta ba ma yin/
283b2('bum): mtshan mar ma yin/ mtshan ma myed par ma yin/ blang bar ma yin/ dor bar ma yin/ dbri bar ma yin/ bsnan par ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin/ rnam par byang bar ma yin/ skye bar ma yin/
283b3('bum): 'gag par ma yin/ gzung bar ma yin/ myi gzung bar ma yin/ len par ma yin/ dor bar ma yin/ gnas par ma yin/ myi gnas par ma yin/ yang dag par ma yin/ log par ma yin/ ldan par
283b4('bum): ma yin/ myi ldan par ma yin/ 'dre bar ma yin/ myi 'dre bar ma yin/ rkyen du ma yin/ rkyen myed par ma yin/ chos su ma yin/ chos ma yin par ma yin/ de bzhin nyid du ma yin/ de bzhin nyid ma yin
283b5('bum): bar ma yin/ yag dag pa'i mtha' ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin par ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/ gzhan la rgya cher rjod cing ston la
283b6('bum): 'chad cing 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed cing / gsal bar byed la yang dag par ston par byed cing / de'i don gtan la bab par ston par byed na/ bsod nams mang du 'phel gyi/ bdag 'ba'
283b7('bum): shig gis gzung ba'am/ kun chub par byas pa'am/ bcangs pa'am/ klag pa 'am/ tshul bzhin du yid la byas pas ni ma yin no/ /ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
283b8('bum): bu mo gang la la zhig / bdag nyid kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin cing / kun chub par byed de/ 'chang zhing klog la/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / de gzhan la yang rgya cher
284a1('bum): rjod cing ston la/ 'chad cing 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la/ yang dag par ston par byed cing / de'i don gtan la bab par ston par byed na/ ke'u shi ka
284a2('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ni/ shin tu mang du 'phel lo/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
284a3('bum): phyin pa de ltar don dang ldan la/ yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bgyi 'am/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
284a4('bum): phyin pa de ltar don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par bstan par byas te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po tshad myed grangs myed pa dang
284a5('bum): ldan par 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la/ shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad myed
284a6('bum): grangs myed pa dag la/ nam mtsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan rnam pa sna
284a7('bum): tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byed thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur bstir byas pa dang / phud dud du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa bas/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am
284a8('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de/ bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol
284b1('bum): zhing / rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
284b2('bum): pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
284b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am
284b4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la las/ lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad myed grangs myed pa dag la/ nam mtsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang /
284b5('bum): spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byed thams cad kyis rim gror byas
284b6('bum): pa dang / bkur bstir byas pa dang / phud dud du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa bas/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la
284b7('bum): rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de/ bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing / rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am
284b8('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung pa'i de bzhin
285a1('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs
285a2('bum): par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
285a3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad myed grangs myed pa dag la/ nam mtsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang /
285a4('bum): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur bstir byas pa dang / phud dud du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa
285a5('bum): bas/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de/ bstan pa
285a6('bum): dang / bshad de bkrol zhing / rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir
285a7('bum): zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/
285a8('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka
285b1('bum): gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad myed grangs myed pa dag la/ nam mtsho'i
285b2('bum): bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad
285b3('bum): kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur bstir byas pa dang / phud dud du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa bas/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
285b4('bum): phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de/ bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing / rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/
285b5('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar
285b6('bum): byung pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /
285b7('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ byang shar phyogs mtshams kyi
285b8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad myed grangs myed pa dag la/ nam mtsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
286a1('bum): na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur bstir byas pa dang / phud dud du byas
286a2('bum): pa dang / mchod pa byas pa bas/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du
286a3('bum): mar brjod de/ bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing / rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du
286a4('bum): 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
286a5('bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
286a6('bum): rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad
286a7('bum): myed grangs myed pa dag la/ nam mtsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs
286a8('bum): dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur bstir byas pa dang / phud dud du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa bas/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
286b1('bum): la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de/ bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing / rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par
286b2('bum): bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar

286b4('bum): rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
286b5('bum): sangs rgyas tshad myed grangs myed pa dag la/ nam mtsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs
286b6('bum): dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byed pa dang / bkur bstir byed pa dang / phud dud du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa bas/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi
286b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de/ bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing / rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am
286b8('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung pa'i de bzhin
287a1('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
287a2('bum): rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
287a3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad myed grangs myed pa dag la/ nam mtsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
287a4('bum): sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur bstir byas pa dang / phud dud du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa bas/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs
287a5('bum): kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de/ bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing / rnam par phye ste gsal
287a6('bum): ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang /
287a7('bum): ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /
287a8('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
287b1('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad myed grangs myed pa dag la/ nam mtsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
287b2('bum): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur bstir byas pa dang / phud dud du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa bas/
287b3('bum): ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de/ bstan pa dang / bshad
287b4('bum): de bkrol zhing / rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha
287b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag
287b6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am
287b7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la las/ steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad myed grangs myed pa dag la/ nam mtsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang /
287b8('bum): spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur
288a1('bum): bstir byas pa dang / phud dud du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa bas/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang
288a2('bum): ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de/ bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing / rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
288a3('bum): bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung pa'i de bzhin
288a4('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par
288a5('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las bskal pa tshad myed grangs myed par
288a6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bskal pa tshad myed grangs myed par dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /
288a7('bum): bskal pa tshad myed grangs myed par dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bskal pa tshad myed grangs myed par dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ brtson
288a8('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bskal pa tshad myed grangs myed par dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bskal pa tshad myed
288b1('bum): grangs myed par dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa bas ni/ gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par dmyigs pa'i
288b2('bum): tshul gyis/ gzhan la rgya cher brjod cing / ston la 'chad cing / rnam par 'god pa dang / rab tu 'god cing / rnam par 'byed la/ gsal bar byed cing / yang dag par ston pa byed na/ de'i
288b3('bum): bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de la dmyigs pa ni 'di yin te/ ke'u shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa gtong zhing / 'di snyam du bdag ni sbyin pa gtong ngo / /
288b4('bum): sbyin pa ni 'di gtong ngo / /'di la ni sbyin pa bya'o snyam na/ des sbyin pa de ltar btang bas/ sbyin pa nyid du 'gyur gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ tshul khrims
288b5('bum): srung zhing / 'di snyam du bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo / /tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo snyam na/ des tshul khrims de ltar bsrungs pas/ tshul khrims nyid du 'gyur gyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
288b6('bum): pa ma yin no/ /dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa bsgom zhing 'di snyam du bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo/ /bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo snyam du/ des bzod pa de ltar bsgoms pas/ bzod pa nyid du 'gyur
288b7('bum): gyi/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ brtson 'grus rtsom zhing / 'di snyam du bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /'di'i don du brtson 'grus brtsam mo snyam du/
288b8('bum): des brtson 'grus de ltar brtsams bas/ brtson 'grus nyid du 'gyur gyi/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug
289a1('bum): cing 'di snyam du bdag ni bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug go/ bsam gtan ni 'di dag la mnyam bar gzhag go snyam na/ des bsam gtan la de ltar mnyam par bzhag
289a2('bum): pas bsam gtan nyid du 'gyur gyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab bsgom zhing / 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab sgom mo/ /shes rab
289a3('bum): ni 'di sgom mo snyam na/ des shes rab de ltar bsgoms bas/ shes rab nyid du 'gyur gyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ltar dmyigs
289a4('bum): ba la spyod pas na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
289a5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /shes
289a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na/ sbyin pa'i
289a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ byang chub
289a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na/
289b1('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/
289b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka 'di la
289b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe/ yongs su gtong ba myi dmyigs/ sbyin pa dang / len pa myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims srung ba'i tshe/ tshul
289b4('bum): khrims dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa sgom pa'i tshe/ bzod pa dang / bzod pa sgom pa myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i tshe/ brtson
289b5('bum): 'grus dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan dang / bsam gtan sgom pa myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab sgom
289b6('bum): pa'i tshe/ shes rab dang / shes rab sgom pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
289b7('bum): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /brtson
289b8('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
290a1('bum): ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ltar khong du chud pa myed par/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o/ de ltar khong du chud pa
290a2('bum): myed par/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o/ /de ltar khong du chud pa myed par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par
290a3('bum): bstan par bya'o/ /de ltar khong du chud pa myed par bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o/ /de ltar khong du chud pa myed par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
290a4('bum): phyin pa don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o/ /de ltar khong du chud pa myed par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
290a5('bum): ke'u shi ka ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston pa 'byung
290a6('bum): ste/ der rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa de dag gis kyang / gzugs brnyan de thos nas/ lam stor bar 'gyur te/ de dag la shes
290a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan gang lags
290a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to snyam zhing / de dag gzugs brnyan ston pa
290b1('bum): byed pa'o/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ ji ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka
290b2('bum): 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa byed pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston te/ de la 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
290b3('bum): brnyan te/ 'di ltar gzugs myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ gzugs bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ gzugs myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du
290b4('bum): gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog par
290b5('bum): 'gyur ro/ /gzugs bdag myed ces bya bar rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag gzugs myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal
290b6('bum): lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzugs bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzugs myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /
290b7('bum): tshor ba myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston / tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ tshor ba bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ tshor ba myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
290b8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod do/ /su la bstan pa de dag kyang / tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba bdag myed ces bya bar
291a1('bum): rtog par 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag tshor ba myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshor ba bdag myed do zhes bya bar
291a2('bum): rtog pa dang / tshor ba myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /'du shes myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ 'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ 'du shes
291a3('bum): bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ 'du shes myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / 'du shes myi rtag ces bya bar
291a4('bum): rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'du shes bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'du shes myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag 'du shes myi rtag go zhes bya
